29a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po gsum pa// rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub
29a7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can kyi yul pa rnams kyi/ kyi yul de dag na/ sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad rab tu 'jil zhing ser sna spang ba'i phyir chos ston pa dang / de dag na sems can
29b1('bum): kyi yul pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa'i sems bskyed cing / kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang / de dag kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ dge ba'i
29b2('bum): rtsa ba de nyid kyis lha'i 'jig rten dang 'jig rten du skyes te/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / nam yang 'bral bar 'gyur bdag mthong
29b3('bum): ngo / / rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can kyi
29b4('bum): yul pa rnams kyi yul de dag na sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad rab tu 'jil zhing ser sna spang ba'i phyir chos ston pa dang / de dag na sems can kyi yul pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
29b5('bum): de dag la byams pa'i sems bskyed cing / kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang / de dag kyi skye gnas de dag nas/ rnam par langs nas dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis lha'i 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten du skyes te
29b6('bum): phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba dag mthong ngo / / rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten
29b7('bum): la rnam par gzigs na/ nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can kyi yul pa rnams kyi kyi yul de dag na/ sdug bsngal ji snyed cig
30a1('bum): yod pa de dag thams cad rab tu 'jil zhing ser sna spang ba'i phyir chos ston pa dang / de dag na sems can kyi yul pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa'i sems bskyed cing /
30a2('bum): kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang / de dag kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis lha'i 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten du skyes te/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das
30a3('bum): pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / nam yang 'bral bar 'gyur ba dag mthong ngo // rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs
30a4('bum): na/ byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can kyi yul ba rnams kyi kyi yul de dag na sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad rab tu 'jil
30a5('bum): zhing ser sna spang ba'i phyir chos ston pa dang / de dag na sems can kyi yul ba de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa'i sems bskyed cing / kyi skye gnas de dag nas/ rnam par ldang ba dang /
30a6('bum): de dag kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis lha'i 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten du skyes te/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi
30a7('bum): bar du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nam yang 'bral bar 'gyur ba dag mthong ngo / / rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten
30b1('bum): gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can kyi yul pa rnams kyi kyi yul de dag na sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad rab tu 'jil zhing ser sna spang ba'i phyir chos
30b2('bum): ston pa dang / de dag na sems can kyi yul ba de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa'i sems bskyed cing / kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang / de dag kyi skye gnas de dag nas
30b3('bum): rnam par langs nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis lha'i 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten du skyes te/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / nam
30b4('bum): yang 'bral bar 'gyur ba dag mthong ngo / / rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed da dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
30b5('bum): dpa' chen po sems can kyi yul pa rnams kyi kyi yul de dag na sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad rab tu 'jil zhing ser sna spang ba'i phyir chos ston pa dang / de dag na sems can kyi yul pa de dag byang chub sems
30b6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' bu chen po de dag la byams pa'i sems bskyed cing / kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang / de dag kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis lha'i 'jig rten dang /
30b7('bum): 'jig rten du skyes te/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nam yang 'bral bar 'gyur ba dag mthong ngo // rab 'byor da ngas 'di nas sangs
31a1('bum): rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can kyi yul pa
31a2('bum): rnams kyi kyi yul de dag na sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad rab tu 'jil zhing ser sna spang ba'i phyir chos ston pa dang / de dag na sems can kyi yul pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag
31a3('bum): la byams pa'i sems bskyed cing / kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang / de dag kyi skye gnas de dag nas/ rnam par langs nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis lha'i 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten du skyes te/
31a4('bum): phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / nam yang 'bral bar 'gyur ba dag mthong ngo // rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la
31a5('bum): rnam par gzigs na/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can kyi yul pa rnams kyi kyi yul de dag na sdug bsngal ji
31a6('bum): snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad rab tu 'jil zhing ser sna spang ba'i phyir chos ston pa dang / de dag na sems can kyi yul pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa'i sems bskyed cing /
31a7('bum): kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang / de dag kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis lha'i 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten du skyes te/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i
31b1('bum): dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nam yang 'bral bar 'gyur ba dag mthong ngo // rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ 'og gi phyogs kyi
31b2('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can kyi yul pa rnams kyi kyi yul de dag na sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad rab tu 'jil zhing ser
31b3('bum): sna spang ba'i phyir chos ston pa dang / de dag na sems can kyi yul pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa'i sems bskyed cing / kyi skye gnas de dag nas/ rnam par ldang ba dang / de dag
31b4('bum): kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis lha'i 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten du skyes te/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du sangs rgyas bcom
31b5('bum): ldan 'das rnams dang / nam yang 'bral bar 'gyur ba dag mthong ngo // rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang
31b6('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can kyi yul pa rnams kyi kyi yul de dag na sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad rab tu 'jil zhing / ser sna yongs su spang ba'i phyir chos ston pa dang / de dag
31b7('bum): na sems can kyi yul pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa'i sems bskyed cing / kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang / de dag kyi skye gnas de dag gnas rnam par
32a1('bum): langs nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis lha'i 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten du skyes te/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang
32a2('bum): nam yang 'bral bar 'gyur ba dag mthong ngo / / rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa'
32a3('bum): sems dpa' chen po rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'
32a4('bum): sems dpa' chen po de dag las lha'i bu de dag gis chos de thos nas/ theg pa gsum pos rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba mthong ste/ rab 'byor
32a5('bum): de la lha'i bu gang 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas shas cher myos pa de dag la gzhal khang de dag 'bar bar snang bar byas shing / de dag skyo bar gyur par shes nas 'di skad du grogs po dag 'du byed thams cad ni rtag pa 'du byed thams cad ni sdug
32a6('bum): bsngal ba/ 'du byed thams cad ni bdag pa 'du byed thams cad ni brtan pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni yid brtan du rung ba/ 'du byed thams cad ni rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can yin na/ 'du byed rnams la lta su zhig yid phebs par gnas shes chos
32a7('bum): ston to/ / rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
32b1('bum): rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de
32b2('bum): dag las lha'i bu de dag gis chos de thos nas theg pa gsum pos rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba mthong ste/ rab 'byor de la lha'i bu
32b3('bum): gang 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas shas cher myos pa de dag las/ gzhal khang de dag 'bar bar snang bar byas shing / de dag skyo bar gyur par shes nas/ 'di skad du grogs po dag 'du byed thams cad ni rtag pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni sdug
32b4('bum): bsngal ba/ 'du byed thams cad ni bdag pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni brtan pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni yid brtan du rung ba/ 'du byed thams cad ni rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can yin na/ 'du byed rnams la lta su zhig yid phebs
32b5('bum): par gnas shes chos ston to/ / rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
32b6('bum): dpa' chen po rgyal chen ba zhi'i ris kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang / byang chub sems
32b7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag las lha'i bu de dag gis chos de thos nas/ theg pa gsum po sa rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar
33a1('bum): 'gyur ba mthong ste/ rab 'byor de la lha'i bu gang 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas shas cher myos pa de dag las/ gzhal khang de dag 'bar bar snang bar byas shing / de dag skyo bar gyur par shes nas/ 'di skad du
33a2('bum): grogs po dag 'du byed thams cad ni mi rtag pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni sdug bsngal ba/ 'du byed thams cad ni bdag pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni brtan pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni yid brtan du rung ba/ 'du byed
33a3('bum): thams cad ni rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can yin na/ 'du byed rnams la lta su zhig yid phebs par gnas shes chos ston to// rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ byang
33a4('bum): phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang /
33a5('bum): 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag las lha'i bu de dag gis chos de thos nas/ theg pa gsum pos rim gyis yongs su mya
33a6('bum): ngan las 'das par gyur pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba mthong ste/ rab 'byor de la lha'i bu gang 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas shas cher myos pa de dag la/ gzhal khang de
33a7('bum): dag 'bar bar snang bar byas shing de dag skyo bar gyur par shes nas/ 'di skad du grogs po dag 'du byed thams cad ni rtag pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni sdug bsngal ba/ 'du byed thams cad ni bdag pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni brtan
33b1('bum): pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni yid brtan du rung ba/ 'du byed thams cad ni rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can yin na/ 'du byed rnams la lta su zhig yid phebs par gnas shes chos ston to// rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas
33b2('bum): kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ byang shar kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang / sum
33b3('bum): cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag las lha'i bu de dag gis chos de thos nas/ theg pa gsum

33b5('bum): dag 'bar bar snang bar byas shing / de dag skyo bar gyur par shes nas/ 'di skad du grogs po dag 'du byed thams cad ni rtag pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni sdug bsngal ba/ 'du byed thams cad ni bdag pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni brtan
33b6('bum): par/ 'du byed thams cad ni yid brtan du rung ba/ 'du byed thams cad ni rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can yin na/ 'du byed rnams la lta su zhig yid phebs par gnas shes chos ston to// rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis
33b7('bum): 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe
34a1('bum): ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag las lha'i bu de dag gis chos de thos nas// theg pa gsum pos
34a2('bum): rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa dang / / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba mthong ste/ rab 'byor de la lha'i bu gang 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas shas cher myos pa de dag la gzhal khang
34a3('bum): de dag 'bar bar snang bar byas shing / de dag skyo bar gyur par shes nas/ 'di skad du grogs po dag 'du byed thams cad ni rtag pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni sdug bsngal ba/ 'du byed thams cad ni bdag pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni brtan pa/

34a5('bum): rten la rnam par gzigs na/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga'
34a6('bum): ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag las lha'i bu de dag gis chos de thos nas/ theg pa gsum pos rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa
34a7('bum): dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba mthong ste/ rab 'byor de la lha'i bu gang 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas shas cher myos pa de dag la gzhal khang de dag 'bar bar snang bar byas shing / de dag skyo bar gyur
34b1('bum): par shes nas/ 'di skad du grogs po dag 'du byed thams cad ni rtag pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni sdug bsngal ba/ 'du byed thams cad ni bdag pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni brtan pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni yid brtan du rung ba/ 'du byed thams cad ni rnam

34b3('bum): gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la
34b4('bum): chos ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag las lha'i bu de dag gis chos de thos nas/ theg pa gsum pos rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / yongs su mya
34b5('bum): ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba mthong ste/ / rab 'byor de la lha'i bu gang 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas shas cher myos pa de dag la gzhal khang de dag 'bar bar snang bar byas shing / de dag skyo bar gyur par shes nas/ 'di skad du grogs po dag 'du byed
34b6('bum): thams cad ni rtag pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni sdug bsngal ba/ 'du byed thams cad ni bdag pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni brtan pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni yid brtan du rung ba/ 'du byed thams cad ni rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can yin na/
34b7('bum): 'du byed rnams la lta su zhig yid phebs par gnas shes chos ston to// rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub
35a1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la
35a2('bum): chos ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag las lha'i bu de dag gis chos de thos nas/ theg pa gsum pos rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / yongs
35a3('bum): su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba mthong ste/ rab 'byor de la lha'i bu gang 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas shas cher myos pa de dag la gzhal khang de dag 'bar bar snang bar byas shing / de dag skyo bar gyur bar shes nas/ 'di skad du grogs po
35a4('bum): dag 'du byed thams cad ni rtag pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni sdug bsngal ba/ 'du byed thams cad ni bdag pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni brtan pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni yid brtan du rung ba/ 'du byed thams cad ni rnam par 'gyur
35a5('bum): ba'i chos can yin na/ 'du byed rnams la lta su zhig yid phebs par gnas shes chos ston to// rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung
35a6('bum): gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la chos ston
35a7('bum): pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag las lha'i bu de dag gis chos de thos nas/ theg pa gsum pos rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / yongs su mya ngan
35b1('bum): las 'da' bar 'gyur ba mthong ste/ rab 'byor de la lha'i bu gang 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas shas cher myos pa de dag la gzhal khang de dag 'bar bar snang bar byas shing / de dag skyo bar gyur par shes nas/ 'di skad du grogs po dag
35b2('bum): 'du byed thams cad ni rtag pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni sdug bsngal ba/ 'du byed thams cad ni bdag pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni brtan pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni yid brtan du rung ba/ 'du byed thams cad ni rnam par 'gyur ba'i
35b3('bum): chos can yin na/ 'du byed rnams la lta su zhig yid phebs par gnas shes chos ston to// rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i
35b4('bum): klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can gang tshangs pa'i lta ba la mngon par zhen pa de dag la/ kye grogs po dag chos thams cad stong pa la ci zhig lta ba skyed/ chos thams cad gsog dang
35b5('bum): gsob sha stag la ci zhig lta ba skyed ces lta ba'i rnam pa de dag dang bral bar byed pa mthong ste/ rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams snying rje chen po la gnas shing / sems can rnams la chos ston to// rab
35b6('bum): 'byor de ni ngo mtshar che ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rmad du byung ba'i chos so// rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi
35b7('bum): khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can gang tshangs pa'i lta ba la mngon par zhen pa de dag la/ kye grogs po dag chos thams cad stong pa la ci zhig lta ba skyed/ chos thams

37b3('bum): gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can gang tshangs pa'i lta ba la mngon par zhen pa de dag la/ kye grogs po dag chos thams cad stong pa la

37b6('bum): gzigs na/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sdud pa mthong ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sbyin pa dang / tshig snyan pa dang / don spyad
37b7('bum): pa dang / don mthun pa'o// rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
38a1('bum): dag rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sdud pa mthong ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sbyin pa dang / tshig snyan pa dang / don spyad pa dang / don mthun pa'o// rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam
38a2('bum): par gzigs na/ nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sdud pa mthong ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sbyin pa dang / tshig snyan pa dang / don
