38a4('bum): dag rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sdud pa mthong ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sbyin pa dang / tshig snyan pa dang / don spyad pa dang / don mthun pa'o// rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ byang shar gyi
38a5('bum): phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sdud pa mthong ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sbyin pa dang / tshig snyan pa dang / don spyad pa dang / don
38a6('bum): mthun pa'o/ / rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag
38a7('bum): rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sdud pa mthong ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sbyin pa dang // tshig snyan pa dang / don spyad pa dang / don mthun pa'o// rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams
38b1('bum): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sdud pa mthong ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sbyin pa dang / tshig snyan pa dang / don spyad pa dang / don mthun pa'o// rab 'byor
38b2('bum): ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag/ rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis
38b3('bum): sdud pa mthong ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sbyin pa dang / tshig snyan pa dang / don spyad pa dang / don mthun pa'o// rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i
38b4('bum): klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sdud pa mthong ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sbyin pa dang / tshig snyan pa dang / don spyad pa dang / don mthun pa'o// rab 'byor ngas yang 'di
38b5('bum): nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sdud pa mthong ste/ bzhi
38b6('bum): gang zhe na/ sbyin pa dang / tshig snyan pa dang / don spyad pa dang / don mthun pa'o// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bzhi pa// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
38b7('bum): dpa' chen po sbyin pas sems can rnams sdud pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa gnyis kyis sems can rnams sdud de/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ zang zing sbyin pa dang / chos sbyin pa'o// rab
39a1('bum): 'byor ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zang zing gi sbyin pas sems can rnams sdud pa yin zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gser ram/
39a2('bum): dngul lam/ nor bu 'am/ mu tig gam/ baiDUr+ya 'am/ dung ngam/ man shel lam/ byu ru 'am/ sa le sbram mam/ zas sam/ skom mam/ gdugs sam/ gos sam/ spos sam/ 'phreng ba 'am/ byug pa 'am/ mal cha 'am/ stan nam/ 'tsho
39a3('bum): ba 'am/ bud dam/ skyes pa 'am/ rta 'am/ glang po 'am/ bdag po yongs su gtong na/ 'di skad du kye sems can dag tshur shog/ bdag nyid kyi dang 'dra bar bslang dgos par khyer cig/ long la dengs shig ces brjod de/ sbyin pa des sbyin pa
39a4('bum): byin nas/ sangs rgyas la skyabs su gtong ngo // chos la skyabs su gtong ngo // dge 'dun la skyabs su gtong ngo // la la ni bslab pa'i gnas lnga 'dzin tu 'dzud do// la la ni yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i nye bar gnas pa la nye bar gnas par
39a5('bum): byed do/ / la la ni dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams la 'god do// la la ni bsam gtan dang po la 'god do// la la ni bsam gtan gnyis pa la 'god do// la la ni bsam gtan gsum pa la 'god do// la la ni bsam gtan bzhi pa la 'god
39a6('bum): do/ / la la ni byams pa la 'god do// la la ni snying rje la 'god do// la la ni dga' ba la 'god do/ la la ni btang snyoms la 'god do// la la ni nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la 'god do// la la ni rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la
39a7('bum): 'god do/ / la la ni pa'i skye mched la 'god do// la la ni 'du shes 'du shes skye mched la 'god do// la la ni sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni chos rjes su dran pa la yang dag par skul
39b1('bum): lo/ la la ni dge 'dun rjes su dran pa la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni tshul khrims rjes su dran pa la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni gtong ba rjes su dran pa la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni lha rjes su dran pa la yang dag par skul lo//
39b2('bum): la la ni lus la gtsang ba las pa'i 'du shes so sor brtag pa la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni rnam par dag pa la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni yang dag par
39b3('bum): spong ba bzhi la yang dag par skul lo/ / la la ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni dbang po lnga la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni stobs lnga la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni byang chub kyi yan lag bdun
39b4('bum): la yang dag par skul lo/ / la la ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa'i ting nge 'dzin la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni rnam par thar
39b5('bum): pa brgyad la yang dag par skul lo/ / la la ni mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni 'jigs pa bzhi la yang
39b6('bum): dag par skul lo/ / la la ni so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni byams pa chen po la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni snying rje chen po la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad
39b7('bum): la yang dag par skul lo/ / la la ni chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis yongs su grub par bya ba la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la yang dag par skul lo// la la
40a1('bum): ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la yang dag par skul lo/ / la la ni phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni dgra bcom pa nyid la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni rang byang
40a2('bum): chub la yang dag par skul lo/ / la la ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yang dag par skul lo// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
40a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can rnams la zang zing gi sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing thabs mkhas pas bla na pa'i bde ba dang ldan par 'god de/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
40a4('bum): po'i ngo mtshar dang rmad du byung ba'i chos so/ / rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos kyi sbyin pas sems can rnams sdud pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor gnyis po 'di
40a5('bum): dag ni chos kyi sbyin pa ste/ 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'o// rab 'byor 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa gang zhe na/ 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams brjod pa dang / bshad pa dang / ma nor bar bstan pa ste/ 'di ltar gtsang ba'i
40a6('bum): rnam pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshangs pa'i rnam par spyod pa bzhi dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / gzhan yang 'jig rten pa'i chos byis pa so so'i skye bo dag dang / thun mong du
40a7('bum): gyur pa rnams te/ rab 'byor de ni 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa de btang nas/ rnam grangs du mas 'jig rten gyi chos ma nor bar blangs pa de las
40b1('bum): bskyod de de las bskyod nas/ thabs mkhas pas 'phags pa'i chos rnams dang / 'phags pa'i chos rnams kyi 'bras bu dag la rab tu 'god do// de la 'phags pa'i chos rnams ni gang / 'phags pa'i chos rnams kyi 'bras bu ni gang zhe na/
40b2('bum): 'phags pa'i chos shes bya ba ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /
40b3('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa rnams so// 'phags pa'i chos rnams kyi 'bras bu ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra
40b4('bum): bcom pa nyid de/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'phags pa'i chos ni/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu shes pa'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shes pa'o// phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shes pa'o//
40b5('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid shes pa'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shes pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shes pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
40b6('bum): pa shes pa'o/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes pa'o// nang stong pa nyid shes pa'o// phyi stong pa nyid shes pa'o// phyi nang stong pa nyid shes pa'o// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shes pa'o// chen po stong pa nyid shes pa'o// don dam pa
40b7('bum): stong pa nyid shes pa'o/ / 'dus byas stong pa nyid shes pa'o// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid shes pa'o// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid shes pa'o// thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid shes pa'o// dor ba pa stong pa nyid shes pa'o/
41a1('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid shes pa'o// chos thams cad stong pa nyid shes pa'o// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid shes pa'o// pa stong pa nyid shes pa'o// dngos po pa stong pa nyid shes pa'o// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shes
41a2('bum): pa'o/ / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shes pa'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi shes pa'o// yang dag par spong ba bzhi shes pa'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi shes pa'o// dbang po lnga shes pa'o// stobs lnga shes pa'o// byang chub kyi yan lag
41a3('bum): bdun shes pa'o/ / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa shes pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi shes pa'o// bsam gtan bzhi shes pa'o// tshad pa bzhi shes pa'o// gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi shes pa'o// rnam par thar
41a4('bum): pa brgyad shes pa'o/ / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu shes pa'o// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa shes pa'o// mngon par shes pa rnams shes pa'o// ting nge 'dzin rnams shes pa'o//
41a5('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams shes pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu shes pa'o// 'jigs pa bzhi shes pa'o// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi shes pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad shes pa'o// byams pa chen po
41a6('bum): shes pa'o/ / snying rje chen po shes pa'o// dga' ba chen po shes pa'o// btang snyoms chen po shes pa'o// gzhan yang 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa pa'i chos rnams dang /
41a7('bum): 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams shes pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes ma gtogs par/ de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'phags pa'i chos rnams so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
41b1('bum): po'i 'phags pa'i chos rnams kyi 'bras bu gang zhe na/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spong ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'phags pa'i chos rnams kyi 'bras bu'o// de nas tshe dang
41b2('bum): ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'thob par 'gyur ram/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
41b3('bum): pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rnam pa
41b4('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la bye brag ci zhig mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bye brag yod do// gsol pa/ bye brag ji lta bu zhig
41b5('bum): mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba'o// de bzhin gshegs pa ni ye shes brnyes pa zhes bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang la gnas
41b6('bum): shing / chos thams cad mun pa pa thob pa la/ byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyang gzhan la/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi thugs kyang gzhan zhes bya ba do// rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems
41b7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa ste/ de la brten pas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa 'byung ngo // rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi sbyin
42a1('bum): pa la sbyor zhing thabs mkhas pas 'phags pa'i chos 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyin pa la bkod nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la 'god pa yin no// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
42a2('bum): chen po'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang /
42a3('bum): stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / tshad pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / mtha'
42a4('bum): dag gi skye mched bcu dang / zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad dang / nyon mongs pa pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / smon nas mkhyen pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / rnam pa thams cad du yongs su dag pa bzhi dang / dbang bcu dang / de bzhin
42a5('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / bsrung du pa gsum dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang / bsnyel ba mnga' ba'i chos nyid dang / bag chags yang dag par bcom pa dang /
42a6('bum): byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang / gzungs kyi sgo lnga brgya dang / ting nge 'dzin
42a7('bum): kyi sgo rnams te/ 'di ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nang gi lus dang / phyi'i lus dang / phyi nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can
42b1('bum): shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang / yid bde ba rnam par bstsal cing rnam par spyod do// lus la kun 'byung ba'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do// lus la zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do//
42b2('bum): lus la kun 'byung ba dang / zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do// lus la gnas par rnam par spyod cing / 'jig rten du gang yang nye bar len pa do// nang gi tshor ba dang / phyi'i tshor ba dang / phyi nang gi tshor ba la tshor ba'i rjes
42b3('bum): su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang / yid bde ba rnam par bstsal cing rnam par spyod do// tshor ba la kun du 'byung ba'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do//
42b4('bum): tshor ba la zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do// tshor ba la kun 'byung ba dang / zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do// tshor ba la gnas par rnam par spyod cing / 'jig rten du gang yang nye bar len pa do// nang gi sems
42b5('bum): dang / phyi'i sems dang / phyi nang gi sems la sems kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang / yid bde ba rnam par bstsal cing rnam par spyod do// sems
42b6('bum): la kun 'byung ba'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do/ / sems la zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do// sems la kun 'byung ba dang / zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do// sems la gnas par rnam par spyod cing / 'jig rten tu
42b7('bum): gang yang nye bar len pa do/ / nang gi chos dang / phyi'i chos dang / phyi nang gi chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang / yid ba de ba rnam par bstsal cing
43a1('bum): rnam par spyod do/ / chos la kun 'byung ba'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do// chos la zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do// chos la kun 'byung ba dang / zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do// chos la
43a2('bum): gnas par rnam par spyod cing / 'jig rten du gang yang nye bar len pa do// rab 'byor yang dag par spong ba bzhi gang zhe na/ sdig to dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams skyed pa'i phyir mos pa skyed pa dang / skyes pa rnams spong
43a3('bum): ba'i phyir rtsol ba dang / dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyir mos pa skyed cing brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / skyes pa rnams 'phel zhing / shin tu rgyas par bya ba dang / bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir mos pa skyed
43a4('bum): pa'o/ / rab 'byor rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi gang zhe na/ mos pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / sems kyi ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi ting nge
43a5('bum): 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'o// dbang po lnga gang zhe na/ dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i
43a6('bum): dbang po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po ste/ de dag ni dbang po lnga zhes bya'o// stobs lnga gang zhe na/ dad pa'i stobs dang / brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang / dran pa'i stobs dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang /
43a7('bum): shes rab kyi stobs te/ de dag ni stobs lnga zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gang zhe na/ dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / brtson 'grus yang
43b1('bum): dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / shin tu byang ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ste
43b2('bum): de dag ni byang chub kyi yan lag bdun zhes bya'o/ / rab 'byor 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ yang dag pa'i lta ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang / yang dag pa'i dag dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang /
43b3('bum): yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang / yang dag pa'i dran pa dang / yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin te/ de dag ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhes bya'o// de la ting nge 'dzin gsum gang zhe na/ stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin
43b4('bum): dang / mtshan ma pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / smon pa pa'i ting nge 'dzin to// stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ stong pa'i rnam pa dang / dben pa'i rnam par sems rtse gcig pa ste/ de ni stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o// mtshan
43b5('bum): ma pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma pa'i rnam par sems rtse gcig pa ste/ de ni mtshan ma pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o// smon pa pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal gyi
43b6('bum): rnam par sems rtse gcig pa ste/ de ni smon pa pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o// rnam par thar pa brgyad gang zhe na/ gzugs can gyis gzugs rnams mthong ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa dang po'o// nang gzugs pa'i 'du shes dang ldan
43b7('bum): pas/ phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams mthong ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa gnyis pa'o// bzang bar mos pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa gsum pa'o// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bzhi pa'o//
44a1('bum): rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar ba lnga pa'o// pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar ba drug pa'o// 'du shes 'du shes
44a2('bum): skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar ba bdun pa'o/ 'du shes dang / tshor ba 'gog pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar ba brgyad pa ste/ de dag ni rnam par thar ba brgyad ces bya'o// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms
44a3('bum): par 'jug pa dgu gang zhe na/ 'di la la la 'dod pas dben sdig to dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas
44a4('bum): so/ / de rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas/ nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/ rtog pa pa dpyod pa pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar
44a5('bum): bsgrubs te gnas so/ / de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing / shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa/ bde ba la rnam par spyod pa/ btang
44a6('bum): snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de bde ba yang spangs sdug bsngal yang spangs shing / yid bde ba dang yid bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas bde ba yang sdug bsngal
44a7('bum): ba yang pa/ btang snyoms dang dran pas yongs su dag pa/ bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs
44b1('bum): kyi 'du shes yid la byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha'
44b2('bum): yas so zhes te/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ ma yod do zhes pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te
44b3('bum): gnas so/ / de rnam pa thams cad du pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes 'du shes skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes 'du shes skye mched
44b4('bum): las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa la nye bar bsgrubs shing gnas te/ 'di ni mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu zhes bya'o// de la mtha' dag gi skye mched bcu gang zhe na/ mtha' dgas dang / mtha' dag
44b5('bum): chu dang / mtha' dag dang / mtha' dag rlung dang / mtha' dag sngon po dang / mtha' dag ser po dang / mtha' dag dmar po dang / mtha' dag dkar po dang / mtha' dag rnam par shes pa dang / mtha' dag nam mkha' ste/ de dag ni mtha'
44b6('bum): dag gi skye mched bcu zhes bya'o/ / de la zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad gang zhe na/ nang gzugs su 'du shes shing / phyi rol gyi gzugs phra mo dang / kha dog sdug gu dang / kha dog sdug pa mthong yang gzugs de dag zil kyis mnan te shes/
44b7('bum): zil kyis mnan te mthong zhing / de ltar 'du shes pa de ni zil kyis gnon pa'i skye mched dang po'o// nang gzugs su 'du shes shing phyi rol gyi gzugs rags pa dang / kha dog sdug pa dang / kha dog sdug pa mthong yang gzugs de dag zil kyis
45a1('bum): mnan te shes/ zil kyis mnan te mthong zhing de ltar 'du shes pa de ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched gnyis pa'o// nang gzugs par 'du shes shing / phyi rol gyi gzugs phra ba dang / kha dog sdug gu dang / kha dog sdug pa mthong
45a2('bum): yang gzugs de dag zil kyis mnan te shes/ zil kyis mnan te mthong zhing de ltar 'du shes pa de ni zil kyis gnon pa'i skye mched gsum pa'o// nang gzugs par 'du shes shing / phyi rol gyi gzugs rags pa dang / kha dog sdug
45a3('bum): pa dang / kha dog sdug pa mthong yang gzugs de dag zil kyis mnan te shes/ zil kyis mnan te mthong zhing de ltar 'du shes pa de ni zil kyis gnon pa'i skye mched bzhi pa'o// nang gzugs par 'du shes shing phyi rol gyi gzugs sngon po/
45a4('bum): kha dog sngon po/ sngon por snang ba/ mdog sngon po 'di lta ste/ dper na me tog o ma ka lta bu'am/ yul bar na ser byas pa'i gos ltar sngo ba/ kha dog sngo ba/ sngo bar snang ba/ mdog sngo bar mthong yang gzugs de dag zil kyis
45a5('bum): mnan te shes/ zil kyis mnan te mthong zhing / de ltar 'du shes pa 'di ni zil kyis gnon pa'i skye mched lnga pa'o// nang gzugs par 'du shes shing / phyi rol gyi gzugs ser po/ kha dog ser po/ ser por snang ba/ mdog ser po
45a6('bum): 'di lta ste/ dper na shing kar shi ka ri'i me tog lta bu'am/ yul bar na ser byas pa'i gos ltar ser ba kha dog ser ba/ ser bar snang ba/ mdog ser bar mthong yang gzugs de dag zil kyis mnan te shes/ zil kyis mnan te mthong zhing /
45a7('bum): de ltar 'du shes pa 'di ni zil kyis gnon pa'i skye mched drug pa'o// nang gzugs par 'du shes shing / phyi rol gyi gzugs dmar po/ kha dog dmar po/ dmar por snang ba/ mdog dmar po 'di lta ste/ dper na ban du dzI ba ka'i me tog
45b1('bum): lta bu 'am/ yul bar na ser byas pa'i gos ltar dmar ba/ kha dog dmar ba dmar bar snang ba mdog dmar bar mthong yang gzugs de dag zil kyis mnan te shes/ zil kyis mnan te mthong zhing de ltar 'du shes pa 'di ni zil kyis
45b2('bum): gnon pa'i skye mched bdun pa'o/ / nang gzugs med par 'du shes shing / phyi rol gyi gzugs dkar po/ kha dog dkar po dkar por snang ba/ mdog dkar po 'di lta ste/ dper na skar ma pa ba sangs kyi 'od lta bu 'am/ yul ba ran
45b3('bum): ser byas pa'i gos ltar dkar ba/ kha dog dkar ba dkar bar snang ba/ mdog dkar bar mthong yang gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan te shes/ zil kyis mnan te mthong zhing / de ltar 'du shes pa 'di ni zil kyis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad
45b4('bum): pa'o/ / de la nyon mongs pa pa gang zhe na/ bsam gtan la gnas nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnam par spyod pa/ sems can pha rol dang / gang zag pha rol gyi nyon mongs pa skye ba'i mthu yong ba ting nge 'dzin gang
45b5('bum): gis 'grub pa de ni nyon mongs pa pa zhes bya'o/ / de la smon lam gyi shes pa gang zhe na/ bsam gtan la gnas te/ 'di shes par bya'o zhes byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dus gsum gyi shes pa'am/ shes pa gang dang gang
45b6('bum): 'dod par gyur pa de la yid kyis smon pa byed de/ de ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas de'i smon lam de yongs su grub par gyur cig// shes bya de yang shes pa de ni smon lam gyi shes pa zhes bya'o// de la mngon par shes pa drug gang zhe na/
45b7('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi mngon par shes pa dang / lha'i gi mngon par shes pa dang / lha'i rna ba'i mngon par shes pa dang / pha rol gyi sems shes pa'i mngon par shes pa dang / sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i mngon par shes pa dang / zag pa zad
46a1('bum): pa shes pa'i mngon par shes pa ste/ drug po de dag go// de la yongs su dag pa bzhi gang zhe na/ lus yongs su dag pa dang / pa yongs su dag pa dang / sems yongs su dag pa dang / ye shes
46a2('bum): yongs su dag pa ste/ bzhi po de dag go/ de la dbang bcu gang zhe na/ tshe la dbang ba dang / sems la dbang ba dang / yo byad la dbang ba dang / las la dbang ba dang / skye ba la dbang ba dang / mos pa la dbang ba dang / smon lam la dbang ba dang /
46a3('bum): rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba dang / ye shes la dbang ba dang / chos la dbang ba ste/ bcu po de dag go/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gang zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa ni gnas la yang gnas su yang dag pa ji
46a4('bum): lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ / gnas ma yin pa la yang gnas ma yin par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i las dang / las yongs su blangs pa'i rnam par smin pa
46a5('bum): gnas kyi rnam pa dang / rgyu'i rnam par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// khams sna tshogs can dang / khams du ma can gyi 'jig rten yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// sems can gzhan dang gang zag gzhan gyis
46a6('bum): mos pa sna tshogs dang / mos pa du ma yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// sems can gzhan dang gang zag gzhan gyi dbang po rab dang / tha ma shes par bya ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// kun tu 'gro ba'i lam yang
46a7('bum): dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba rnam par
46b1('bum): dgong pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ / rnam pa du mar sngon gyi gnas rjes su dgongs te/ tshe rabs gcig kyang rjes su dgongs pa nas/ tshe rabs brgya dang / tshe rabs stong dang / tshe rabs brgya stong dang / tshe rabs bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag
46b2('bum): stong gi bar du yang rjes su dgongs so/ / bskal pa gcig kyang rjes su dgongs pa nas/ bskal pa brgya'i bar dang / bskal pa brgya phrag du ma dang / bskal pa stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa brgya stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong
46b3('bum): phrag du ma'i bar dag kyang rjes su dgongs te/ bdag ni 'di lta bu zhig na 'dug 'dug go// ni 'di zhes bya bar gyur to// rigs ni 'di zhes bya bar gyur to// rus ni 'di zhes bya bar gyur to// zas ni 'di za za'o// yun ni 'di srid cig tu gnas
46b4('bum): gnas so/ / tshe'i mtha' ni 'di tsam zhig tu gyur te/ bdag de nas shi 'phos nas che ge mo zhig tu skyes so zhes bya ba nas/ de nas shi 'phos nas kyang 'dir skyes so zhes bya ba'i bar du rnam pa dang bcas/ sa mal dang bcas/ gtan tshigs dang bcas par
46b5('bum): rnam pa du mar sngon gyi gnas rjes su dgongs so/ / lha'i rnam par dag pa las 'das pas sems can 'chi 'pho ba dang / skye bdag kyang gzigs so// kha dog sdug pa dang / sdug pa dang / bzang ba dang ngan pa dang / bde 'gro na 'khod pa dang /
46b6('bum): ngan song na 'khod pa dang / las ji lta ba bzhin du nye bar 'dong ba'i sems can rnams rab tu mkhyen te/ sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa/ dag gis ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa/ yid kyis ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa la
46b7('bum): skur pa 'debs pa/ log par lta bdag ste/ de'i rgyu de'i rkyen kyis lus zhig nas ngan song log par ltung ba sems can dmyal bar skye'o// sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ ngag gis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ yid kyis
47a1('bum): legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa yang dag par lta ba dag ste/ de'i rgyu de'i rkyen kyis lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten lha'i nang du skye'o zhes bya bar rab tu mkhyen to// zag pa rnams zad pa'i
47a2('bum): phyir sems rnam par grol ba dang / shes rab rnam par grol ba dang / zag pa pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen te/ bcu po de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs so// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'jigs pa bzhi gang zhe na/ bdag
47a3('bum): gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes dam bcas na/ de la chos 'di rnams mngon par sangs ma rgyas so// zhes bya bar bdag la dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ skye dgu'i tshogs gzhan su yang rung ste/
47a4('bum): 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro// zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang yang dag par rjes su mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ de la bdag bde ba thob pa dang / bag tsha ba pa thob pa dang / 'jigs pa thob par rnam par
47a5('bum): spyod de/ khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o// 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra bsgrag go// tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am lha 'am/ bdud dam tshangs pa'am/ gzhan sus kyang rung ste/ chos dang ldan par
47a6('bum): bskor bar nus pa bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o/ / bdag zag pa zad do zhes dam bcas na/ de la zag pa 'di rnams yongs su zad bar ma gyur to zhes bya bar bdag la dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ skye dgu'i
47a7('bum): tshogs gzhan su 'ang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang yang dag par rjes su mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ de la bdag bde ba thob pa dang / bag tsha ba pa thob pa dang /
47b1('bum): 'jigs pa thob pa rnam par spyod de/ khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o// 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra bsgrag go// tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ gzhan sus
47b2('bum): kyang rung ste/ chos dang ldan par bskor bar nus pa bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o// gang yang bdag gis bar chad kyi chos su bsten pa de dag la bsten na/ bar chad kyi chos su 'gyur ro// zhes dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ lha'am/
47b3('bum): bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ skye dgu'i tshogs gzhan su 'ang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang yang dag par rjes su mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ de la bdag bde ba thob
47b4('bum): pa dang / bag tsha ba pa thob pa dang / 'jigs pa thob par rnam par spyod de/ khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o// 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra bsgrag go// tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/
47b5('bum): lha'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ gzhan sus kyang rung ste/ chos dang ldan par bskor bar nus pa bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o// gang yang bdag gis lam 'phags pa'i 'byung ba rtogs par 'gyur ba de byed pa'i sdug bsngal yang dag par
47b6('bum): zad par 'gyur bar bstan pa de dag la nan tan byas na/ sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par 'gyur ba 'byung ngo zhes/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ lha'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ skye dgu'i tshogs gzhan su'ang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos
47b7('bum): dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro/ / zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang yang dag par rjes su mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ de la bdag bde ba thob pa dang / bag tsha ba pa thob pa dang / 'jigs par thob par rnam par spyod de/ khyu
48a1('bum): mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o/ / 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra bsgrag go/ tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ lha'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ gzhan sus kyang rung ste/
48a2('bum): chos dang ldan par bskor bar nus pa bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o zhes bya ba ste/ bzhi po de dag ni 'jigs pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ don so so yang dag par rig pa
48a3('bum): dang / chos so so yang dag par rig pa dang / des pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa dang / spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa ste/ de dag kyang gang zhe na/ don la pa dang / chos la pa dang / nges pa'i tshig la
48a4('bum): pa dang / spobs pa la pa'o// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsrung ba pa gsum gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni sku'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la sku'i spyod pa yongs su ma dag pa mnga'
48a5('bum): bas/ la las shes su 'ong zhes gang yang bcab par dgongs pa de bzhin gshegs pa la mnga' ste/ 'di ni bsrung ba pa dang po'o// de bzhin gshegs pa ni gsung gi spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la
48a6('bum): gsung gi spyod pa yongs su ma dag pa mnga' bas/ la las shes su 'ong zhes gang yang bcab par dgongs pa de bzhin gshegs pa la mnga' ste/ 'di ni bsrung ba pa gnyis pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa ni thugs kyi spyod
48a7('bum): pa yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la thugs kyi spyod pa yongs su ma dag pa mnga' bas/ la las shes su 'ong zhes gang yang bcab par dgongs pa de bzhin gshegs pa la mnga' ste/ 'di ni bsrung ba
48b1('bum): pa gsum pa'o/ / de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos ston pa'i tshe/ la la rna btud de rim gror nyan cing bka' nyan pa'i sems nye bar gzhog pa dang / chos
48b2('bum): dang gnyer ba'i chos la nan tan du byed na/ yang des de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes par 'gyur/ yid bde bar 'gyur/ thugs yeng yeng por 'gyur te/ 'di ni dgongs pa nye bar gzhag pa dang po'o// la la rna btud de/
48b3('bum): rim gror nyan cing / bka' nyan pa'i sems nye bar gzhog pa pa dang / chos dang gnyer ba'i chos la nan tan du byed na yang des de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs khro bar 'gyur/ bzod par 'gyur/ thugs ches
48b4('bum): par 'gyur te/ 'di ni dgongs pa nye bar gzhag pa gnyis pa'o// la la rna btud de rim gror nyan cing bka' nyan pa'i sems nye bar gzhog la/ chos dang gnyer ba'i chos la nan tan du byed/ la la rna btud de rim gror nyan
48b5('bum): cing / bka' nyan pa'i sems nye bar gzhog pa de/ chos dang gnyer ba'i chos la nan tan du byed kyang / des de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa 'am/ thugs khro ba gnyis su 'gyur te/ thams cad du dgongs pa dang ldan
48b6('bum): zhing mkhyen par btang snyoms su rnam par spyod pa 'di ni dgongs pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum pa'o/ / de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyams pa pa'i chos nyid gang zhe na/ gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams don yod pa'i chos
48b7('bum): ston pa'i phyir sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad pa la dus las 'da' ba ste/ de ni nyams pa pa'i chos nyid ces bya'o// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i bag chags kyi sgrib pa rab tu spangs pa gang zhe na/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs
49a1('bum): rgyas thams cad ni nyon mongs pa spangs kyang de dag la lus kyi 'gyur ba yod kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa la ni de lta bu yang mnga' ste/ de ni bag chags kyi sgrib pa rab tu spangs pa zhes bya'o// de la de bzhin gshegs
49a2('bum): pa'i thugs rje chen po gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa thugs rje chen po gang dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi brda nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba gzigs pa'i phyir dus thams cad du 'jig rten la nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du rtog pa
49a3('bum): mdzad ces bya ste/ dngos su na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs rje chen po// sems can mtha' yas pa yongs su smin par bya ba la gzigs pa rtag par 'byung ste/ de ni thugs rje chen po zhes bya'o// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
49a4('bum): chos ma 'dres pa brgyad gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul pa mnga'o// ca co mnga'o// dgongs pa nyams pa mnga'o// 'du shes sna tshogs mnga'o// thugs mnyam par ma bzhag pa mnga'o// ma brtags pa'i btang snyoms
49a5('bum): mnga'o/ / mos pa yongs su nyams pa mnga'o// brtson 'grus yongs su nyams pa mnga'o// dgongs pa yongs su nyams pa mnga'o// ting nge 'dzin yongs su nyams pa mnga'o// shes rab yongs su nyams pa mnga'o// rnam par
49a6('bum): grol pa yongs su nyams pa mnga'o/ / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa yongs su nyams pa mnga'o// sku'i 'phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste/ ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo // gsung gi phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du
49a7('bum): 'gro ba ste/ ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo // thugs kyi phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste/ ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo // 'das pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go// ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma chags ma
49b1('bum): thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go/ / da ltar byung ba'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug pa ste/ de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang
49b2('bum): zhe na/ gang la pa pa dang / dran pas dbang sgyur ba/ zhi ba'i rnam pa dang ldan pa/ mtshan nyid pa'i mtshan nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya'o// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe
49b3('bum): na/ phyag dang zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa dang / zhabs shin tu gnas pa dang / phyag dang zhabs dra bar 'brel pa dang / phyag dang zhabs gzhon zhing 'jam pa dang / bdun shin tu mtho ba dang / sor mo ring ba dang / rting pa yangs pa dang /
49b4('bum): sku che zhing drang ba dang / zhabs legs par mtho ba dang / yan lag gi spu gyen du 'khyil pa dang / e na ya'i byin pa lta bu dang / phyag brla drang por slebs pa dang / gsang ba'i gnas sbubs su nub pa dang / gser gyi kha dog dang / mdog shin tu
49b5('bum): 'jam pa dang / spu re re nas g.yas phyogs su 'khyil pa dang / zhal mdzod spus brgyan pa dang / seng ge'i ro stod lta bu dang / phrag pa'i lhun mdzes par grub pa dang / phrag so shin tu rgyas pa dang / ro bro ba'i mchog dang ldan pa dang / shing n+ya grod ltar chu
49b6('bum): zheng gab pa dang / dbu spyi gtsug dang ldan pa dang / ljags shin tu yangs pa dang / tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang / seng ge'i 'gram pa lta bu dang / tshems shin tu dkar ba dang / tshems mnyam pa dang / tshems thags bzang ba dang / tshems mnyam zhing
49b7('bum): bzhi bcu tshang ba dang / spyan dkar nag 'byes pa dang / ba'i rdzi ma lta bu ste/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil la 'khor lo'i rtsibs stong dang ldan pa/ mu khyud can lte ba dang bcas pa rnam pa thams cad du yongs su rdzogs pa 'di
50a1('bum): lta ste/ rus pa 'am ba so la gzugs brkos pa dang 'dra ba mnga' bas phyag dang zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa'o// zhabs kyi mthil gnyis mnyam par sa la 'jog cing / zhabs zhum pa pas/ zhabs shin tu
50a2('bum): gnas pa'o/ / ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo dra bar 'brel pas phyag dang zhabs dra bar 'brel pa'o// shing bal gyi ye'u ltar shin tu 'jam zhing gzhon pas phyag dang zhabs gzhon zhing 'jam pa'o// phyag dang zhabs dang mgur
50a3('bum): gyi lhun dang ltag pa'i phyogs na shin tu mtho bas bdun shin tu mtho ba'o/ / phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo ring bas sor mo ring ba'o// rting pa ring bas rting pa yangs pa'o// sku lag pa mdun du 'phags la drang bas sku che zhing drang ba'o// pus mo'i
50a4('bum): lha nga dang / long bu mdzes par nub pas zhabs legs par mtho ba'o// spu gyen du g.yas phyogs su 'khyil bas/ yan lag gi spu gyen du 'khyil pa'o// e na ya'i byin pa dang / smyig ma dang ldum bu dar ba ltar drang zhing mnyams
50a5('bum): la rim gyis gzhol bar grub cing / byin pa zlum pas e na ya'i byin pa lta bu'o// brla drang por bzhag ste ma btud kyang / phyag gi mthil gnyis kyis pus mo'i lha nga la reg pas/ phyag brla drang por slebs pa'o// glang po dang rta
50a6('bum): cang shes ltar gsang ba'i gnas shin tu mdzes par sbubs su nub pas/ gsang ba'i gnas sbubs su nub pa'o// shin tu sbyangs pa'i gser gyi kha dog lta bu dang ldan pas gser gyi kha dog go// gser dang dngul shin tu sbyangs pa ltar
50a7('bum): 'jam zhing snyoms pa'i mdog tu 'dug la sku la rdul 'go bas mdog shin tu 'jam pa'o/ / shin tu rnam par phye ba'i spu re rer skyes shing gnyis su pas/ spu re re nas g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba'o// me tog kun da dang zla ba
50b1('bum): dang / 'o ma dang / ba mo'i mdog ltar 'dug la/ nyi ma dang zla ba brgya las kyang 'phags par 'od gsal ba'i mdzod spus smin mtshams shin tu brgyan pas/ zhal mdzod spus brgyan pa'o// ro stod che bas seng ge'i ro stod do// mgur dang
50b2('bum): rgyud legs par 'brel cing lhun zlum pas/ phrag pa'i lhun mdzes par grub pa'o// gser gyi gtan pa shin tu phyis pa ltar phrag so legs par grub pas phrag so shin tu rgyas pa'o// rlung dang / mkhris pa dang / bad kan gyis ma
50b3('bum): nyams shing rnam par shes pa 'dra ba pas/ ro bro ba'i mchog go// sku chu zheng 'dom du mnyam pas shing n+ya grod ltar chu zheng gab pa'o// spyi gtsug zlum zhing legs la g.yas phyogs su 'khyil pa dang ldan pa'i dbu mnyam zhing
50b4('bum): legs par grub la mdzes pa mnga' bas dbu spyi gtsug dang ldan pa'o/ / tog ud pa la dmar po'i 'dab ma'i kha dog lta bur 'dug cing shin tu yangs pas ljags shin tu yangs shing srab pa'o// tshangs pa dang bya ka la ping ka
50b5('bum): lta bu'i gsung mnga' bas/ tshangs pa'i dbyangs so// 'gram pa long gi dkyil 'khor ltar legs par grub cing mdzes par skyes te/ yid du 'ong bas seng ge'i 'gram pa lta bu'o// tog kun da dang dung gi bcag 'phro ltar shin tu dkar ba'i
50b6('bum): tshems mnga' bas tshems shin du dkar ba'o/ / tshems la mtho dman pas tshems mnyam pa'o// tshems la mtshams ma dod pas tshems thags bzang pa'o// bla 'og tu gye gu pas tshems mnyam zhing bzhi bcu tshang ba'o// dkar
50b7('bum): nag gi cha ma 'dres la shin tu rnam par dag cing mdog dmar po sam yogs pas spyan dkar nag 'byes pa'o/ / rdzi ma bla 'og shin tu legs par gnas la ma 'dzings pas ba'i rdzi ma lta bu'o// de la bla ma'i bsu bskyal dang / chos mnyan pa
51a1('bum): la sdod pa dang / gtsug lag khang dang mchod rten rjes su sgrub pa la pa la phu dud du byas pas phyag dang zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa ste/ de ni 'khor shin tu mang ba'i snga ltas so// yi dam la brtan pas
51a2('bum): zhabs shin tu gnas pa ste/ de ni g.yo zhing shin tu brtan pa'i snga ltas so// sbyin pa dang / ngag snyan pa dang / don spyod pa dang / don mthun pa'i bsdu ba rnam bzhi goms par byas pas phyag dang zhabs dra bar 'brel pa ste/ de ni myur du 'du ba'i
51a3('bum): snga ltas so/ / bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / btung ba zhim zhing nyams su bde ba byin pas phyag dang zhabs gzhon zhing / 'jam pa dang / bdun shin tu mtho ba ste/ de gnyis ni bza' ba dang bca' ba dang btung ba shin tu zhim zhing nyams su bde
51a4('bum): ba thob pa'i snga ltas so/ / bcings pa bkrol ba dang / srog gi rim gro byas pa dang / srog gcod pa spangs pas sor mo ring ba dang / rting pa yangs pa dang / sku che zhing drang ba ste/ de ni sku tshe ring ba'i snga ltas so// dge ba'i chos yang dag
51a5('bum): par blangs pa dang / bzung ba mngon par spel zhing 'grib par ma byas pas zhabs kyi gong mtho ba dang / yan lag gi spu gyen du 'khyil pa ste/ de ni nyam pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i snga ltas so// rig pa dang bzo'i las rim gror byas shing
51a6('bum): gzhan byin pa dang / bdag gis blangs pas e na ya'i byin pa lta bu ste/ de ni myur du 'dzin pa'i snga ltas so// bdog cing yod pa'i nor la bslangs na 'gong bar gtong zhing ces ma byas pas phyag brla drang bor slebs pa ste/
51a7('bum): de ni yo byad la mnga' ba dang dul ba'i snga ltas so// grogs po dang mdza' bshes dang gnyen ma bye ba dang / bye bar gyur pa'i sems can rnams bsdums pa dang / tshangs pa'i spyod pa la yang dag par bskul pa dang / gsang ba'i tshig yongs su
51b1('bum): bsrungs pas/ gsang ba'i gnas sbubs su nub pa ste/ de ni bu mang ba'i snga ltas so// stan dang / gos dang / khang pa dang / gzhal khang dang / gnas bzang po byin pas gser gyi kha dog dang mdog shin tu 'jam pa ste/ de gnyis ni gdan dang
51b2('bum): na bza' dang / khang pa dang / gzhal med khang dang / gnas bzang po thob pa'i snga ltas so// 'du 'dzi spangs pa dang / mkhan po dang / slob dpon dang / pha ma dang phu nu la pa bla ma rnams la tshul dang 'dra bar rim gror byas pa dang / btsun par
51b3('bum): byas pa dang / bcol pa rna la ma gzan pas spu re re nas g.yas phyogs su 'khyil pa dang / zhal mdzod spus brgyan pa ste/ de ni mnyam pa pa'i snga ltas so// snyan par zer zhing smod la snyan par smra zhing / legs par bshad pa mthun par 'dzin
51b4('bum): pas seng ge'i ro stod lta bu dang / phrag pa'i lhun mdzes par grub pa ste/ de ni thub pa pa'i snga ltas so// na ba rnams la rtsi dang / rim gro dang / sman dang nyams su phan pa'i zas byin pa dang / rim gro byas pas phrag so shin tu rgyas pa dang / ro bro ba'i
51b5('bum): mchog ste/ de ni nad nyung ba'i snga ltas so// skyed mos tshal dang / 'khor dang / btung ba dang / rdzing bu dang / rgal dka' ba'i zam pa dang / kha zas dang / 'phreng ba'i gnas dang / stegs dang / gtsug lag khang bya ba la pa la gzhan mos
51b6('bum): par bya ba sngon du gtong zhing / bdag gis gzhan byin pas shing n+ya grod ltar chu zheng gab pa dang / dbu spyi gtsug dang ldan pa ste/ de ni mnga' chen po mnga' ba'i snga ltas so// yun ring por tshig snyan cing 'jam pa dang / nyams su bde bar smras
51b7('bum): pas ljags shin tu yangs shing srab pa dang / tshangs pa'i dbyangs te/ de gnyis ni yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i gsung mnga' ba'i snga ltas so// gsung yan lag lnga dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni yongs su shes shing / rnam par shes par 'gyur ba
52a1('bum): dang / mnyan na dga' zhing mthun pa pa dang / zab cing dbyangs rjes su 'byung ba dang / gtang bra zhing rnar snyan pa dang / ma 'khrugs shing gsal ba'o// yun ring po nas tshig kyal pa spangs shing / dus su smra smra bas
52a2('bum): seng ge'i 'gram pa lta bu ste/ de ni tshig kun gyis mnyan pa'i snga ltas so// rim gror bya ba dang brnyas pa pa gnyis kyis 'tsho ba yongs su dag pas/ tshems shin tu dkar ba dang mnyam pa ste/ de ni 'khor snga nas bstsags pa'i snga ltas
52a3('bum): so/ / yun ring po nas bden zhing phra ma pa'i tshig smra smra bas tshems thags bzang ba dang / tshems mnyam zhing bzhi bcu tshang ba ste/ de ni 'khor dbyer phyed pa'i snga ltas so// pang gis mkhyud pa bzhin du nyes par bsam pa la/ ma chags
52a4('bum): sngang ba dang / rmongs pa pa'i gis lta lta bas/ spyan dkar nag 'byes pa dang / ba'i rdzi ma lta bu ste/ de ni kun nas mdzes pa'i snga ltas so// rab 'byor de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis so// de la de bzhin
52a5('bum): gshegs pa'i dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mngon par 'du bya ba thams cad las dben pa ste/ sen mo zangs kyi mdog ltar 'dug pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gnyen
52a6('bum): bshes byams pa dang 'dra bar sems can la phan pa dang bde ba'i thugs mnga' ba ste/ sen mo'i mdog snum pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rigs dang rgyud mthon por byung ba ste/ sen mo mtho ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
52a7('bum): ni tshul la kha na ma tho ba mnga' ba ste/ sor mo zlum pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu tshogs pa ste/ sor mo rgyas pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rim gyis grub pa ste/ sor mo rim gyis
52b1('bum): gzhol ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni thugs dang / gsung dang sku'i 'phrin las dang 'tsho ba shin tu dben pa ste/ rtsa mi mngon pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni nyon mongs pa'i mdud pa 'grel pa ste/ rtsa la mdud pa pa
52b2('bum): yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shin tu dben pa'i chos mnga' ba ste/ long bu mi mngon pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mnyam pa thams cad las sgrol bste zhabs mnyam pa pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
52b3('bum): 'das rnams ni seng ge ste/ seng ge'i 'gros su bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni glang po ste/ glang po'i 'gros su bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar nam mkha' la bzhud pa ste/
52b4('bum): ngang pa'i stabs su bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni khyu mchog ste/ khyu mchog gi stabs su bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mthun pa'i lam mnga' ba ste/ g.yas phyogs su bzhud pa yin/
52b5('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni blta na mdzes pa ste/ mdzes par bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rtag tu thugs yon po mnga' ba ste ma yo bar bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni tshul rnam par
52b6('bum): dag pa'i yon tan ston pa ste/ sku shin tu legs pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sdig pa'i chos rnams shin tu spyangs pa ste/ sku shin tu sbyangs pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ chos rim gyis ston pa ste/
52b7('bum): skur rim gyis gzhol ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ sku dang / gsung dang / thugs gtsang ma dang ldan pa ste/ sku shin tu gtsang ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rang bzhin gyis thugs 'jam
53a1('bum): pa dang ldan pa ste/ sku shin tu 'jam pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i thugs mnga' ba ste/ sku shin tu rnam par dag pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos dang
53a2('bum): 'dul ba shin tu rdzogs pa ste/ dpe byad shin tu rdzogs pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni yon tan yangs shing bzang ba ston pa ste/ sku che zhing mdzes pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can thams cad la
53a3('bum): mnyam pa'i thugs mnga' ba ste/ sku legs par mnyam pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mchog tu 'jam pa'i chos ston pa ste/ sku shin tu gzhon pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rtag tu zhum pa pa'i
53a4('bum): thugs mnga' ba ste/ skra zhum pa pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dge ba'i rtse ba thams cad byang ba ste/ sku shin tu rgyas pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni yang 'byung ba shin tu bcom zhing zad pa ste/ sku
53a5('bum): shin tu mkhregs pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i yan lag dang / nying lag legs par ston pa ste/ yan lag dang nying lag spa bar mdzes pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
53a6('bum): rnams ni gzigs pa shin tu rnam par dag pa ste/ snang ba rab rib cing rnam par dag pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni tshul dang ldan pa'i slob ma mnga' ba ste/ phyal zlum pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni
53a7('bum): 'khor ba'i nyes pa thams cad shin tu sbyangs pa ste/ phyal shin tu byang ba dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni nga rgyal gyi de'u bcom pa ste/ phyal ma zhom pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos zad pa rnam
53b1('bum): par zlog pa ste/ phyal phyam mer 'dug pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos zab mo shin tu thugs su chud pa ste/ lte ba zab pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mthun par 'dzin pa'i slob ma mnga' ba ste/ lte
53b2('bum): ba g.yas phyogs su 'khyil pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni slob ma kun nas mdzes pa'i dge 'dun mnga' ba ste/ kun nas mdzes pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni thugs shin tu gtsang ma dang ldan
53b3('bum): pa ste/ kun spyod pa shin tu gtsang ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos nag po bstan pa dang bral ba'i chos dang 'dul ba mnga' ba ste/ sku la sme ba dang gnag bag pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shing
53b4('bum): bal ltar yang ba rab tu thob pa'i chos ston pa ste/ phyag shing bal ltar shin tu 'jam pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rang gi skye bo dang / skye bo phal la byams pas dge sbyong chen po brnyes pa ste/ phyag gi ri mo snum pa yin/
53b5('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shin tu zab cing brtan par bzhugs pa ste/ phyag gi ri mo zab pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bzod pa'i chos yangs pa ston pa ste/ phyag gi ri mo ring ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
53b6('bum): 'das rnams ni bslab pa'i gnas ha cang yang ring bar 'cha' ba ste/ zhal ha cang yang ring ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gzugs brnyan 'jig rten thams cad du bkye ba ste/ zhal la gzugs kyi gzugs brnyan snang
53b7('bum): ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jam pa sngon du btang zhing 'dul ba ste/ ljags shin tu 'jam pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni yon tan phra ba'i tshogs dang ldan pa ste/ ljags shin tu srab pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom
54a1('bum): ldan 'das rnams ni byis pa'i skye bo 'dod chags pa rnams kyi chos dang 'dul ba gting dpag par dka' ba ste/ ljags shin tu dmar ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni glang po'i sgra dang 'brug gi sgra lta bus bsnyengs pa
54a2('bum): mnga' ba ste/ glang po'i nga ro dang 'brug gi dbyangs dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni snyan cing 'jam pa dang / nyams su bde bar smra ba'i slob ma mnga' ba ste/ snyan cing 'jam pa dang / nyams su bde ba'i gsung dang ldan pa yin/
54a3('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni srid pa kun tu sbyor ba las 'das pa ste/ tshems mche ba shin tu zlum pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni skye bo rno ba rnams 'dul ba ste/ tshems mche ba rno ba dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
54a4('bum): rnams ni chos dang 'dul ba shin tu dkar ba ste/ tshems mche ba shin tu dkar ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sa'i phyogs mnyam pa la bzhugs pa ste/ mche ba mnyam pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rim gyis mngon par
54a5('bum): rtogs pa'i chos ston pa ste/ tshems mche ba rim gyis gzhol ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shes rab kyi ri bo mthon po la bzhugs pa ste/ shangs legs par mtho ba dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'dul ba'i skye bo
54a6('bum): gtsang ma mnga' ba ste/ shangs shin tu gtsang ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos phul du yangs pa mnga' ba ste/ spyan ring ba dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gzigs pa shin tu rnam par dag pa ste
54a7('bum): spyan rnam par dag pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can gyi tshogs shin tu bstsags pa ste/ rdzi ma stug pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni lha dang lha ma yin dang / skyes bu dang / na chung mchog dkar nag 'byes shing pad
54b1('bum): mo'i 'dab ma ltar 'dug pa rnams kyis mngon par dga' bar byas pa ste/ spyan dkar nag 'byes shing pad mo'i 'dab ma ltar 'dug pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rtag tu yangs pa gzigs pa ste/ smyin ma ring ba dang ldan pa yin/ sangs
54b2('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jam par 'dul ba la mkhas pa ste/ smyin ma 'jam pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni skyon thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ smyin ma'i spu mnyam pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
54b3('bum): rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba'i snum gyis sems snum par gyur pa'i skye bo 'dul ba ste/ smyin ma snum pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos mchog tu yangs shing don dang ldan pa mnga' ba ste/ snyan legs shing snyan shal ring ba yin/ sangs rgyas
54b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das rnams ni nyon mongs pa'i rgyud las rnam par rgyal pa ste/ snyan mnyam pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can bsam pa mnyams pa 'dul ba ste/ snyan gyi dbang po mnyams pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas
54b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das rnams ni lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad yongs su byang ba ste/ zhal 'phral ba legs par grub pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni phas kyi rgol ba shin tu 'dul ba ste/ zhal 'phral ba yangs pa dang ldan pa yin/
54b6('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni smon lam dam pa shin tu rdzogs pa ste/ dbu shin tu rgyas pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni yul gyi bung ba rnam par zlog pa ste/ dbu bung ba ltar gnag pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
54b7('bum): 'das rnams ni mthong ba dang bsgom pas spang ba'i bag la nyal ba zad par byas pa ste/ dbu stug pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni thugs 'jam pas bstan pa'i snying po thugs su chud pa ste/ dbu 'jam pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom
55a1('bum): ldan 'das rnams ni rtag tu ma 'khrugs pa'i thugs dang ldan pa ste/ dbu 'dzings pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni brlang ba'i gsung dang yongs su bral ba ste/ dbu rtsub pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom
55a2('bum): ldan 'das rnams ni byang chub kyi yan lag spos kyi tog gis skye bo mthun par bsgrubs pa ste/ dbu dri zhim pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni phyag dang zhabs dpal gyi be'u dang / bkra shis dang / dga' ba 'khyil pas brgyan
55a3('bum): pa yin/ rab 'byor de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu'o// rab 'byor de ltar de lta bu'i chos kyi rnam pa de dag gzhan la bshad pa dang / bstan pa dang / yang dag par
55a4('bum): bstan pa de ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa zhes bya ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ sems can rnams zang zing gi sbyin pa dang chos kyi sbyin pas sdud pa yin te/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
55a5('bum): chen po rnams kyi ngo mtshar dang rmad du byung ba'i chos so/ / // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po lnga pa// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshig snyan pas
55a6('bum): sems can rnams sdud pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis sems can rnams sdud pa yin te/ 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod
55a7('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snyan par smra bas sems can
55b1('bum): rnams sdud do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis dge ba'i chos thams cad ma 'dus pa de/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshig snyan par smra bas sems can rnams sdud do// rab
55b2('bum): 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don bya bas sems can rnams sdud pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis don bya bas sems can rnams sdud do// de ci'i
55b3('bum): phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis dge ba'i chos thams cad ma 'dus pa de/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don bya bas sems can rnams sdud do// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems
55b4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po don mthun pas sems can rnams sdud pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis don mthun pas sems can rnams sdud do// de ci'i
55b5('bum): phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis dge ba'i chos thams cad ma 'dus pa med de/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don mthun pas sems can rnams sdud do// rab 'byor de yang byang
55b6('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ngo mtshar dang / rmad du byung ba'i chos so// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems
55b7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan dag la 'di skad du 'dems shing 'di skad ston to/ / rigs kyi bu khyed tshur sheg/ yi ge mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas par gyis shig/ yi ge gcig la mkhas par gyis shig/ yi ge gnyis nas yi ge
56a1('bum): bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bar la mkhas par gyis shig/ yi ge gcig gis byang ba'i rang bzhin thams cad shes par gyis shig/ yi ge gnyis kyis byang ba'i rang bzhin thams cad shes par gyis shig/ yi ge bzhi
56a2('bum): bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bar gyis byang ba'i rang bzhin thams cad shes par gyis shig/ yi ge gcig tu yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis 'dus par sgoms shig/ yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis su yi ge gcig 'dus par sgoms shig ces ston to// rab 'byor
56a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de yang yi ge gcig la mkhas pa yin/ yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bar la mkhas pa yin/ yi ge gcig gi nang du yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis 'dus par bsgom pa la mkhas pa yin/ yi ge bzhi
56a4('bum): bcu rtsa gnyis su yi ge gcig 'dus par bsgom pa la mkhas pa yin te/ de de ltar yi ge mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas par byas nas/ la la goms shing yi ge pa mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas pa yin no// rab 'byor 'di lta
56a5('bum): ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni chos la mkhas pa dang / yi ge la mkhas pa yin te/ de chos la mkhas pa dang / yi ge la mkhas pas yi ge mang pos yi ge pa'i chos ston
56a6('bum): kyang / rab 'byor chos de yi ge'i rnam pa dang 'bral ba yang ma yin te/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ngo mtshar dang rmad du byung ba'i chos te/ gang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang
56a7('bum): thun mong ma yin no/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gal te mtha' las 'das pa dang thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid nye bar bzung ste/ sems can yang shin tu
56b1('bum): / chos kyang / chos kyi dngos po yang pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson
56b2('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin po dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad pa bzhi dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi
56b3('bum): la spyod pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la spyod pa dang / stong pa nyid bcu bzhi la spyod pa dang / stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / mtshan ma pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / smon pa pa'i ting nge 'dzin la spyod pa dang / rnam par
56b4('bum): thar pa brgyad la spyod pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang /
56b5('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad dang / chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu la spyod cing / rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i mngon par shes pa drug la gnas nas sems can rnams la chos ston par
56b6('bum): 'gyur/ de la ni sems can te/ sems can du gdags pa yang so// sems can pas gzugs su ma mchis so// sems can pas tshor ba su ma mchis so// sems
56b7('bum): can pas 'du shes su ma mchis so/ / sems can pas 'du byed su ma mchis so// sems can pas rnam par shes pa su ma mchis so// sems can pas
57a1('bum): su ma mchis so/ / sems can pas/ rna ba su ma mchis so// sems can pas/ sna su ma mchis so// sems can pas/ lce su ma mchis
57a2('bum): so/ / sems can pas/ lus su ma mchis so// sems can pas/ yid su ma mchis so// sems can pas/ gzugs su ma mchis so// sems can
57a3('bum): pas/ sgra su ma mchis so// sems can pas/ dri su ma mchis so// sems can pas/ ro su ma mchis so// sems can pas/ reg su ma mchis so// sems
57a4('bum): can pas/ chos su ma mchis so// sems can pas/ gi rnam par shes pa su ma mchis so// sems can pas/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa su ma mchis so// sems
57a5('bum): can pas/ sna'i rnam par shes pa su ma mchis so// sems can pas/ lce'i rnam par shes pa su ma mchis so// sems can pas/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa su ma
57a6('bum): mchis so/ / sems can pas/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa su ma mchis so// sems can pas/ gi 'dus te reg pa su ma mchis so// sems can pas/ rna ba'i 'dus te
57a7('bum): reg pa su ma mchis so/ / sems can pas/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa su ma mchis so// sems can pas/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa su ma mchis so// sems can pas/
57b1('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa su ma mchis so// sems can pas/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa su ma mchis so// sems can pas/ gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba su ma mchis so// sems can
57b2('bum): pas/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba su ma mchis so// sems can pas/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba su ma mchis so// sems can pas/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis
57b3('bum): tshor ba su ma mchis so/ / sems can pas/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba su ma mchis so// sems can pas/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba su ma mchis so// sems
57b4('bum): can pas/ sa'i khams su ma mchis so// sems can pas/ chu'i khams su ma mchis so// sems can pas/ khams su ma mchis so// sems can
57b5('bum): pas rlung gi khams su ma mchis so/ / sems can pas/ nam mkha'i khams su ma mchis so// sems can pas/ rnam par shes pa'i khams su ma mchis so// sems can
57b6('bum): pas/ ma rig pa su ma mchis so// sems can pas/ 'du byed su ma mchis so// sems can pas/ rnam par shes pa su ma mchis so// sems can pas/ dang gzugs
57b7('bum): su ma mchis so/ / sems can pas/ skye mched drug su ma mchis so// sems can pas/ reg pa su ma mchis so// sems can pas/ tshor ba su ma mchis so//
58a1('bum): sems can pas/ sred pa su ma mchis so// sems can pas/ len pa su ma mchis so// sems can pas/ srid pa su ma mchis so// sems can
58a2('bum): pas/ skye ba su ma mchis so// sems can pas/ rga shi su ma mchis so// sems can pas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa su ma mchis so// sems can pas/ tshul
58a3('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa su ma mchis so/ / sems can pas/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa su ma mchis so// sems can pas/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa su ma mchis so// sems
58a4('bum): can pas/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa su ma mchis so// sems can pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa su ma mchis so// sems can pas/ nang stong pa nyid su ma
58a5('bum): mchis so/ / sems can pas/ phyi stong pa nyid su ma mchis so// sems can pas/ phyi nang stong pa nyid su ma mchis so// sems can pas/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid su ma mchis
58a6('bum): so/ / sems can pas/ chen po stong pa nyid su ma mchis so// sems can pas/ don dam pa stong pa nyid su ma mchis so// sems can pas/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid
58a7('bum): su ma mchis so/ / sems can pas/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid su ma mchis so// sems can pas/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid su ma mchis so// sems can pas/
58b1('bum): thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid su ma mchis so// sems can pas/ dor ba pa stong pa nyid su ma mchis so// sems can pas/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid su ma mchis so//
58b2('bum): sems can pas/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid su ma mchis so// sems can pas/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid su ma mchis so// sems can pas/ pa
58b3('bum): stong pa nyid su ma mchis so/ / sems can pas/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid su ma mchis so// sems can pas/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid su ma mchis so// sems can

58b5('bum): su ma mchis so/ / sems can pas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa su ma mchis so// sems can pas/ dbang po lnga su ma mchis so// sems can pas/ stobs lnga
58b6('bum): su ma mchis so/ / sems can pas/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun su ma mchis so// sems can pas/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa su ma mchis so// sems can

59b1('bum): pas/ rang byang chub su ma mchis so// sems can pas/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid su ma mchis so// sems can mi pas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid su ma mchis
59b2('bum): so/ / sems can pas/ chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis su ma mchis so// sems can pas/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu su ma mchis so// sems can su ma mchis pa la ni/
59b3('bum): sems can ma mchis so// gzugs ma mchis so// tshor ba ma mchis so// 'du shes ma mchis so// 'du byed ma mchis so// rnam par shes pa ma mchis so// ma mchis so// rna ba ma mchis so// sna ma mchis so// lce ma mchis

59b5('bum): ma mchis so/ / sna'i rnam par shes pa ma mchis so// lce'i rnam par shes pa ma mchis mo// lus kyi rnam par shes pa ma mchis so// yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma mchis so// gi 'dus te reg pa ma mchis so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ma

59b7('bum): pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma mchis so/ / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma mchis so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma mchis so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma mchis so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba
60a1('bum): ma mchis so/ / sa'i khams ma mchis so// chu'i khams ma mchis so// khams ma mchis so// rlung gi khams ma mchis so// nam mkha'i khams ma mchis so// rnam par shes pa'i khams ma mchis so// ma

60b6('bum): du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang na/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la par 'gyur ba lta
60b7('bum): ga las mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ ji skad du smras pa bzhin no// rab 'byor de ltar sems can pas nang stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// phyi stong pa nyid du rig par
61a1('bum): bya'o/ / phyi nang stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// chen po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// don dam pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// 'dus byas stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// 'dus ma byas

61a5('bum): bya'o/ / bdag stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// sems can stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// srog stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// 'gro ba stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// gso ba stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// skyes bu stong pa nyid du rig par
61a6('bum): bya'o/ / gang zag stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// shed can stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// shed bdag stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// byed pa po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// byed du 'jug pa po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// slong ba po stong pa
61a7('bum): nyid du rig par bya'o/ / kun nas slong ba po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// tshor ba po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// tshor bar byed pa po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// shes pa po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// mthong ba po stong pa nyid du
61b1('bum): rig par bya'o/ / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// yang dag par spong ba stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// dbang po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// stobs stong pa nyid du rig par
61b2('bum): bya'o/ / byang chub kyi yan lag stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// bsam gtan stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// tshad
61b3('bum): pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// rnam par thar pa brgyad stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu stong pa nyid bu rig par bya'o//

61b5('bum): dag par rig pa bzhi stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ / byams pa chen po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// snying rje chen po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// rgyun tu zhugs
61b6('bum): pa'i 'bras bu stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// dgra bcom pa nyid stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// rang byang chub stong
61b7('bum): pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid stod pa nyid du rig par bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// sangs rgyas stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o//
62a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// rab 'byor de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos de dag thams cad stong par mthong nas/ phyin ci log tu
62a2('bum): gyur ba'i sems can rnams la chos ston to/ / ji ltar stong pa nyid de dag la yang 'jug pa de ltar ston to// des de ltar mthong nas chos thams cad sgrib ba par shes te/ chos gang yang 'khrug par byed/ gnyis su byed
62a3('bum): do/ / yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yang ston pa byed do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa ni/ sprul pa bye ba phrag du ma sprul cing / sems can la la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor/ la la tshul khrims kyi
62a4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor/ la la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor/ la la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor/ la la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor/ la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor/ la la bsam

62a7('bum): sbyor/ la la mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la sbyor/ la la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma pa dang smon pa pa la sbyor/ la la mngon par shes pa lnga la sbyor/ la la ting nge 'dzin thams cad la sbyor/ la la gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la sbyor/
62b1('bum): la la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la sbyor/ la la 'jigs pa bzhi la sbyor/ la la so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la sbyor/ la la byams pa chen po la sbyor/ la la snying rje chen po la sbyor/ la la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa

62b3('bum): nyid la sbyor/ la la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la sbyor na/ rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/ sprul pa des chos la la zhig tha dad du phye ba yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
62b4('bum): pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can rnams la chos ston te/ de dag phyin ci log rnams las yongs su bkrol nas/ ma bcings ma grol ba'i
62b5('bum): tshul du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu 'god do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba/ tshor ba ma bcings ma grol ba/ 'du shes ma bcings ma grol ba/ 'du byed ma bcings ma grol ba/ rnam par shes pa ma
62b6('bum): bcings ma grol ba/ ma bcings ma grol ba/ rna ba ma bcings ma grol ba/ sna ma bcings ma grol ba/ lce ma bcings ma grol ba/ lus ma bcings ma grol ba/ yid ma bcings ma grol ba/ gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba/ sgra ma bcings ma
62b7('bum): grol ba/ dri ma bcings ma grol ba/ ro ma bcings ma grol ba/ reg ma bcings ma grol ba/ chos ma bcings ma grol ba/ gi rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba/ sna'i rnam par shes pa ma
63a1('bum): bcings ma grol ba/ lce'i rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba/ gi 'dus te reg pa ma bcings ma grol ba/

63a4('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma bcings ma grol ba/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma bcings ma grol ba/ sa'i khams ma bcings ma grol ba/ chu'i khams ma bcings ma grol ba/ khams ma bcings ma grol ba/ rlung gi khams ma
