278b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub ste/ yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams dbang po lnga sgom mo// dbang po lnga bsgoms pas 'khor ba las
278b6('bum): yongs su thar bar 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / dbang po lnga la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar
278b7('bum): na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / stobs lnga la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems
279a1('bum): can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub ste/ yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams stobs lnga sgom mo// stobs lnga bsgoms pas/ 'khor ba las yongs su thar bar 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de
279a2('bum): ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / stobs lnga la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson
279a3('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub
279a4('bum): ste/ yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams byang chub kyi yan lag bdun sgom mo// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun bsgoms pas/ 'khor ba las yongs su thar par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub
279a5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson
279a6('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dag la yo byad rnams
279a7('bum): nye bar sgrub ste/ yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom mo// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgoms pas/ 'khor ba las yongs su thar bar 'gyur
279b1('bum): te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub
279b2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
279b3('bum): sems can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub ste/ yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi sgom mo// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi bsgoms pas/ 'khor ba las yongs su thar
279b4('bum): bar 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub
279b5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / yang dag par spong ba bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can
279b6('bum): dag la yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub ste/ yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams yang dag par spong ba bzhi sgom mo// yang dag par spong ba bzhi bsgoms pas/ 'khor ba las yongs su thar bar 'gyur te/ rab
279b7('bum): 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / yang dag par spong ba bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
280a1('bum): sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can
280a2('bum): dag la yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub ste/ yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi sgom mo// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi bsgoms pas/ 'khor ba las yongs su thar bar 'gyur te/ rab
280a3('bum): 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
280a4('bum): sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / dbang po lnga la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dag la yo byad
280a5('bum): rnams nye bar sgrub ste/ yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams dbang po lnga sgom mo// dbang po lnga bsgoms pas/ 'khor ba las yongs su thar bar 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems
280a6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / dbang po lnga la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha
280a7('bum): rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / stobs lnga la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub ste/ yo byad de dag gis
280b1('bum): yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams stobs lnga sgom mo/ / stobs lnga bsgoms pas/ 'khor ba las yongs su thar bar 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu

280b3('bum): sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dag la yo byad rnams nye bar sgrub ste/ yo byad de dag gis yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams byang chub kyi

280b7('bum): can rnams 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom mo/ / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgoms pas/ 'khor ba las yongs su thar bar 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
281a1('bum): dpa' chen pos bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes

281a7('bum): yongs su thar bar 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / yang dag par spong ba bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar

282b3('bum): chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sems can mgon pa/ sdug bsngal ba/ kha zas dang / gos kyis phongs pa dag mthong na/ 'di ltar yongs su smin par byed de/ rigs kyi bu dag khyed tshur shog nga las
282b4('bum): zas dang / skom dang / gos dang / bzhon pa dang / mal cha dang / me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / khyim dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUr+ya dang / dung dang

282b6('bum): bde bar 'gyur gyis/ 'di ltar don 'di ni pha bi'i yin gyi/ bdag gi ma yin no snyam du bsam par mi bya'o// don 'di ni bdag gis yun ring po nas sems can rnams kyi don du bsgrubs pa yin no zhes de ltar khyed kyis bdag gi yin
282b7('bum): par soms la/ sems can rnams la yongs su thong shig/ sbyin pa des kyang tshul khrims la sbyor cig/ bzod pa la sbyor cig/ brtson 'grus la sbyor cig/ bsam gtan la sbyor cig/ shes rab la sbyor cig/ nang stong

285b7('bum): 'dogs te/ phan pa de lta bus phan btags pas/ de dag brtson 'grus rtsom ste/ le lo cing brtson 'grus rtsom par gyur pa de dag brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/
286a1('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
286a2('bum): la gnas/ nang stong pa nyid la gnas/ phyi stong pa nyid la gnas/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la gnas/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la gnas/ chen po stong pa nyid la gnas/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la
286a3('bum): gnas/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la gnas/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ dor ba pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gnas/ chos
286a4('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la gnas/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la gnas/ pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas/ dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid
286a5('bum): stong pa nyid la gnas/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la gnas/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi la gnas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la gnas/ dbang po lnga la gnas/ stobs lnga la gnas/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun
286a6('bum): la gnas/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gnas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la gnas/ bsam gtan rnams la gnas/ tshad pa rnams la gnas/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
286a7('bum): rnams la gnas/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la gnas/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la gnas/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa la gnas/ mngon
286b1('bum): par shes pa rnams la gnas/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la gnas/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gnas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la gnas/ 'jigs pa bzhi la gnas/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la gnas/ snying

292a1('bum): po lnga 'am/ stobs lnga 'am/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun nam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi 'am/ bsam gtan bzhi 'am/ tshad pa bzhi 'am/ gzugs

292a5('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bam/ chos gang la yang mngon par chags par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid kyis chos thams cad kyis stong ste/ stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid la

292b1('bum): pa ma yin pa'i 'dzin pa la spyod de/ kye ma sems can 'di dag ni yang dag pa ma yin pa'i 'dzin pa las dgrol bar bya na dka' ba byed do zhes nas/ de'i tshe thabs mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ 'di skad du ston to//
