320b6('bum): pa rnams la gnas shing / sems can rnams kyi don byed pa yin no// de lha'i rnam par dag pa las 'das pa de nyid kyis shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mthong ste de de dag tu rdzu 'phrul gyis song zhing /
320b7('bum): sbyin pa 'am/ tshul khrims sam/ bzod pa 'am/ brtson 'grus sam/ bsam gtan nam/ shes rab bam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams
321a1('bum): sam/ dbang po rnams sam/ stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'am/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang /
321a2('bum): smon pa med pa 'am/ bsam gtan rnams sam/ tshad pa rnams sam/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms
321a3('bum): par 'jug pa rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/ 'jigs pa rnams sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/ nyan thos kyi chos sam/
321a4('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis sems can rnams kyi don byed cing / sems can de dag gi bya ba byed de/ de la sems can ser sna can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du
321a5('bum): chos ston te/ sbyin pa byin cig// phongs pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ phongs pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos kyis/ de ltar khyed kyis sbyin pa byin la/ bdag cag kyang bde bar gyis shig/
321a6('bum): gzhan yang bde bar gyis shig/ phongs pas zil kyis non cing nying sha nying gis zos te/ ngan song gsum las thar bar gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// sems can tshul khrims ngan pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad
321a7('bum): du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag tshul khrims ngan pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ tshul khrims ngan pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/ tshul khrims ngan pa'i rnam par smyin pa ni/ sems can
321b1('bum): dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du ltung na/ bdag cag kyang gdon par nus na/ gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis/ de'i phyir khyed kyis tshul
321b2('bum): khrims ngan pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang dbye'o/ / phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// sems can phan tshun gnod sems su gyur pa ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ de ltar khyed gcig la
321b3('bum): gcig gnod sems su ma byed cig/ sems 'khrugs par gyur pa la dge ba'i chos gang yang skye bar 'gyur te/ de lta bas na khyed phan tshun sems 'khrug par gyur na/ sems can dmyal bar skye ba'am/ byol song gi skye
321b4('bum): gnas su skye ba 'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i gnas yod kyis/ de bas na khyed kyis 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// sems can le lo
321b5('bum): can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag le lo ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ le los ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/ le lo'i rnam par smyin pa ni sems can dmyal ba'am/
321b6('bum): byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du ltung na/ bdag cag kyang gdon par nus na/ gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis/ de'i phyir khyed kyis le lo'i sems 'ga' tsam
321b7('bum): gyi go skabs kyang dbye'o/ / phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// sems can sems g.yeng ba gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag sems g.yeng ba ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ gang
322a1('bum): sems g.yeng ba'i rnam par smyin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du ltung na/ bdag cag kyang gdon par
322a2('bum): nus na/ gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis/ de'i phyir khyed kyis g.yeng ba'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// sems can shes rab 'chal pa can gang ji
322a3('bum): snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag shes rab 'chal pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ shes rab 'chal pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos kyis/ shes rab 'chal pa'i rnam par
322a4('bum): smyin pa ni/ sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed kyis shes rab 'tshal pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re
322a5('bum): zhes chos ston to/ / 'dod chags kyi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag sdug pa la sbyor ro// zhe sdang gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag byams pa la sbyor ro// gti mug gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag rten cing 'brel par 'byung
322a6('bum): ba la sbyor ro/ / lam ngan par zhugs pa gang ji snyed pa de dag yang dag pa'i lam la sbyor te/ nyan thos kyi lam mam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi lam mam/ sangs rgyas kyi lam la sbyor zhing / de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ khyed chos
322a7('bum): gang la mngon par zhen par gyur pa'i chos de dag ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams la ni mngon par zhen par nus te/ stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa do zhes chos ston to// rab 'byor de ltar byang chub
322b1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas shing / sems can rnams kyi don byed pa yin no// de lha'i rnam par dag pa las 'das pa de nyid kyis/ lho
322b2('bum): nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mthong ste/ de de dag tu rdzu 'phrul gyis song zhing / sbyin pa 'am/ tshul khrims sam/ bzod pa 'am/ brtson 'grus sam/ bsam gtan nam/ shes rab bam/ dran
322b3('bum): pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang po rnams sam/ stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'am/

322b5('bum): 'dzin rnams sam/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/ 'jigs pa rnams sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
322b6('bum): rnams sam/ nyan thos kyi chos sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyis sems can rnams kyi don byed cing sems can de dag gi bya ba byed de/ de la sems

326b7('bum): gyur ta re zhes chos ston to/ / sems can sems g.yeng ba gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag sems g.yeng ba ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ gang sems g.yeng ba'i rnam par smyin pa ni sems can

327a5('bum): kyi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag sdug pa la sbyor ro/ / zhe sdang gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag byams pa la sbyor ro// gti mug gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la sbyor ro//
327a6('bum): lam ngan par zhugs pa gang ji snyed pa de dag yang dag pa'i lam la sbyor te/ nyan thos kyi lam mam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi lam mam/ sangs rgyas kyi lam la sbyor zhing de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ khyed chos gang la mngon
327a7('bum): par zhen par gyur pa'i chos de dag ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams la ni mngon par zhen par nus te/ stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa do zhes chos ston to// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub
327b1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas shing / sems can rnams kyi don byed pa yin no// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu pa
327b2('bum): stong phrag brgya pa/ / bam po nyi shu gnyis pa// de lha'i rnam par dag pa las 'das pa de nyid kyis/ steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mthong ste de de dag tu rdzu 'phrul gyis song zhing / sbyin pa 'am/
327b3('bum): tshul khrims sam/ bzod pa 'am/ brtson 'grus sam/ bsam gtan nam/ shes rab bam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang po rnams
327b4('bum): sam/ stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'am/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa 'am/ bsam gtan rnams
327b5('bum): sam/ tshad pa rnams sam/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ de
327b6('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/ 'jigs pa rnams sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/ nyan thos kyi chos sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/
327b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis sems can rnams kyi don byed cing / sems can de dag gi bya ba byed de/ de la sems can ser sna can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ sbyin
328a1('bum): pa byin cig/ phongs pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ phongs pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos kyis/ de ltar khyed kyis sbyin pa byin la bdag cag kyang bde bar gyis shig/ gzhan yang
328a2('bum): bde bar gyis shig/ phongs pas zil kyis non cing nying sha nying gis zos te/ ngan song gsum las thar bar gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// sems can tshul khrims ngan pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/
328a3('bum): kye skyes bu dag tshul khrims ngan pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ tshul khrims ngan pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/ tshul khrims ngan pa'i rnam par smyin pa ni/ sems can dmyal ba 'am/
328a4('bum): byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du ltung na/ bdag cag kyang gdon par nus na/ gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis/ de'i phyir khyed kyis tshul khrims ngan pa'i
328a5('bum): sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang dbye'o/ / phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// sems can phan tshun gnod sems su gyur pa gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ de ltar khyed gcig
328a6('bum): la gcig gnod sems su ma byed cig/ sems 'khrugs par gyur pa la dge ba'i chos gang yang skye bar 'gyur te/ de lta bas na khyed phan tshun sems 'khrug par gyur na/ sems can dmyal bar skye ba 'am/ byol song
328a7('bum): gi skye gnas su skye ba 'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i gnas yod kyis/ de bas na khyod kyis 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to//
328b1('bum): sems can le lo can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag le lo ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ le los ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/ le lo'i rnam par smyin pa ni/ sems
328b2('bum): can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/ bdag cag kyang gdon par nus na/ gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis/ de'i phyir khyod kyis
328b3('bum): le lo'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang dbye'o/ / phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// sems can sems g.yeng ba gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag sems g.yeng ba ni sdug bsngal
328b4('bum): ba ste/ gang sems g.yeng pa'i rnam par smyin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du ltung na/ bdag cag kyang gdon par nus na/ gzhan
328b5('bum): gdan par lta ci smos kyis/ de'i phyir khyod kyis g.yeng ba'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// sems can shes rab 'chal pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di
328b6('bum): skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag shes rab 'chal pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ shes rab 'chal pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/ gang shes rab 'chal pa'i rnam par smyin pa ni/
328b7('bum): sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed kyis shes rab 'chal pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes
329a1('bum): chos ston to/ / 'dod chags kyi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag ni sdug pa la sbyor ro// zhe sdang gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag ni byams pa la sbyor ro// gti mug gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de
329a2('bum): dag ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la sbyor ro/ / lam ngan par zhugs pa gang ji snyed pa de dag ni yang dag pa'i lam la sbyor te/ nyan thos kyi lam mam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi lam mam/ sangs rgyas kyi lam la sbyor zhing de dag la
329a3('bum): 'di skad du chos ston te/ khyed chos gang la mngon par zhen par gyur pa'i chos de dag ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams la ni mngon par zhen par nus te/ stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa med do
329a4('bum): zhes chos ston to/ / rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas shing / sems can rnams kyi don byed pa yin no// rab
329a5('bum): 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/ mngon par shes pa rnams la ma gnas par sems can rnams la chos bstan par nus te/ lam gol bar zhugs pa'i sems can rnams kyang lam du gzud par nus
329a6('bum): so/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ bya 'dab ma pas ni/ nam mkha' la 'gro bar nus so// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang mngon par shes pa rnams la ma brten par
329a7('bum): sems can rnams la chos bstan par nus so/ / rab 'byor de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par bsgrub par bya ste/
329b1('bum): de mngon par shes pa mngon par bsgrubs pa de dag gis/ sems can rnams kyi don ci bya bar dga' ba de bde bar byed do// des lha'i gis shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed mthong ste/ de dag tu
329b2('bum): sems can gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag kyang mthong ngo / / de ltar mthong nas kyang rdzu 'phrul gyis de dag tu song zhing / sems can de dag gi sems sems kyis khong du chud par byas nas/ de dang mthun par sbyin pa'i gtam mam/
329b3('bum): tshul khrims kyi gtam mam/ bzod pa'i gtam mam/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam mam/ bsam gtan gyi gtam mam/ shes rab kyi gtam mam/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam mam/ 'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to//

329b5('bum): de dag gi sems sems kyis khong du chud par byas nas/ de dang mthun par sbyin pa'i gtam mam/ tshul khrims kyi gtam mam/ bzod pa'i gtam mam/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam mam/ bsam gtan gyi gtam mam/

329b7('bum): sems can gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag kyang mthong ngo / / de ltar mthong nas kyang rdzu 'phrul gyis de dag tu song zhing / sems can de dag gi sems sems kyis khong du chud par byas nas/ de dang mthun par sbyin pa'i

333a4('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam mam/ 'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to// de sems kyi rnam grangs shes pa shin tu rnam par dag pa dang ldan pa yin te/ de sems kyi rnam grangs shes pa des sems can
333a5('bum): rnams kyi sems shes par byas shing / de dag la de bzhin nyid du chos ston te/ sbyin pa'i gtam mam/ tshul khrims kyi gtam mam/ bzod pa'i gtam mam/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam mam/ bsam gtan gyi
333a6('bum): gtam mam/ shes rab kyi gtam mam/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam mam/ 'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to// de bdag gam gzhan gyi sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du mar rjes su dran te// sngon gyi gnas rjes
333a7('bum): su dran pa'i shes pa des/ / sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtshan 'di zhes bya ba nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa byung ngo zhes bya bar yang shes te/ sems can
333b1('bum): sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa la mos pa gang ji snyed pa de dag la yang dag pa nyid du chos ston te/ sbyin pa'i gtam mam/ tshul khrims kyi gtam mam/ bzod pa'i gtam mam/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam mam/ bsam
333b2('bum): gtan gyi gtam mam/ shes rab kyi gtam mam/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam mam/ 'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to// de rdzu 'phrul gyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma
333b3('bum): snyed dag tu song zhing / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byed de/ bsnyen bkur byas nas/ mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyis sems can rnams la chos ston te/ sbyin pa'i gtam mam/
333b4('bum): tshul khrims kyi gtam mam/ bzod pa'i gtam mam/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam mam/ bsam gtan gyi gtam mam/ shes rab kyi gtam mam/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam mam/ 'byung ba'i gtam
333b5('bum): gyi bar du chos ston to/ / de zag pa pa mngon du bya ba'i shes pa shin tu rnam par dag pa dang ldan pa yin te/ de zag pa pa mngon du bya ba'i shes pa shin tu rig pa des sems can rnams la chos ston te/ sbyin pa'i
333b6('bum): gtam mam/ tshul khrims kyi gtam mam/ bzod pa'i gtam mam/ brtson 'grus kyi gtam mam/ bsam gtan gyi gtam mam/ shes rab kyi gtam mam/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam mam/ 'byung
333b7('bum): ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to/ / rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par bsgrub par bya ste/ de mngon
334a1('bum): p ar shes pa shin tu 'dris pa de dag gis lus ci dang ci lta bu yongs su gzung bar 'dod pa de dang de lta bu'i lus yongs su gzung zhing mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can rnams kyi don byed cing bde ba 'am
334a2('bum): sdug bsngal ba de dag gis gos par 'gyur ro/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa'i skyes bu ni/ dgos pa thams cad byed kyang bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba des gos par 'gyur ba
334a3('bum): do/ / rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / mngon par shes pas rnam par rtse zhing phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed
334a4('bum): dag tu mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos ston kyang bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba des phrogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
334a5('bum): de ltar mngon par shes pas/ rnam par brtse bar bya ste/ ci nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par 'gyur ba dang / sems can yongs su smyin par 'gyur ba de ltar brtse bar bya ste/ rab 'byor byang chub sems
334a6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par ma byas/ sems can yongs su smyin par ma byas par/ bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
334a7('bum): rgya bar nus so/ / rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lam gyi yan lag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la/ bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub do// rab 'byor gyis
334b1('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lam gyi yan lag yongs su rdzogs par bgyis shing / bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
334b2('bum): bar 'gyur ba'i lam gyi yan lag de dag gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor dge ba'i chos thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam gyi yan lag go/ gsol
334b3('bum): pa/ bcom ldan 'das lam gyi yan lag gang gis/ bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos de dag gang lags/ bcom
334b4('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyang / de la rtog cing de yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir
334b5('bum): 'di ni sbyin pa'o/ / 'di la yongs su gtang bar bya'o// bdag gis sbyin par bya'o zhes gsum po de dag la rtog pa ste sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba
334b6('bum): 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/ / sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyang de la rtog cing / de tshul khrims srung ba'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis
334b7('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni tshul khrims so/ / bdag gis tshul khrims bsrung ngo // 'di'i don du tshul khrims bsrung ngo // zhes gsum po de dag la rtog pa ste/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las
335a1('bum): sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyang de la rtog cing /
335a2('bum): bzod pa sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni bzod pa'o// bdag gis bzod pa bsgom mo// 'di'i don du bzod pa bsgom par bya'o// zhes gsum po de dag la rtog pa ste/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu
335a3('bum): phyin pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
335a4('bum): kyang de la rtog cing / brtson 'grus rtsom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni brtson 'grus so// bdag gis brtson 'grus brtsam mo// 'di'i don du brtson 'grus brtsam par bya'o// zhes gsum po
335a5('bum): de dag la rtog pa ste/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/
335a6('bum): dge ba'i chos bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyang de la rtog cing / de bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhog pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'di ni bsam gtan no// bdag gis bsam gtan
335a7('bum): la mnyam par gzhag go/ 'di'i don du bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhag go zhes gsum po de dag la rtog pa ste/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang
335b1('bum): sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/ / sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyang / de la rtog cing de shes rab sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis
335b2('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni shes rab bo/ / bdag gis ni shes rab bsgom mo/ 'di'i don du shes rab bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la rtog pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las
335b3('bum): sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos nang stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de la rtog cing / nang stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe/
335b4('bum): ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni nang stong pa nyid do// bdag gis nang stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o// 'di'i don du nang stong pa nyid bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la rtog pa ste/ nang stong pa nyid gang gis
335b5('bum): bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos phyi stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de la rtog cing / phyi stong pa
335b6('bum): nyid sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni phyi stong pa nyid do// bdag gis phyi stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o// 'di'i don du phyi stong pa nyid bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la rtog pa ste/ phyi stong pa nyid gang
335b7('bum): gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de la rtog cing /
336a1('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni phyi nang stong pa nyid do// bdag gis phyi nang stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o// 'di'i don du phyi nang stong pa nyid bsgom mo zhes
336a2('bum): gsum po de dag la rtog pa ste/ phyi nang stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge
336a3('bum): ba'i chos stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de la rtog cing / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do// bdag gis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o//
336a4('bum): 'di'i don du stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bsgom mo// zhes gsum po de dag la rtog pa ste/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i
336a5('bum): chos so/ / sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos chen po stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de la rtog cing / chen po stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni chen po stong pa nyid do//
336a6('bum): bdag gis chen po stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o// 'di'i don du chen po stong pa nyid bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la rtog pa ste/ chen po stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba
336a7('bum): 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/ / sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de la rtog cing / don dam pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong
336b1('bum): pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'di ni don dam pa stong pa nyid do// bdag gis don dam pa stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o// 'di'i don du don dam pa stong pa nyid bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la rtog pa ste/ don dam pa stong pa nyid gang gis
336b2('bum): bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de la rtog cing /
336b3('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid do// bdag gis 'dus byas stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o// 'di'i don du 'dus byas stong pa nyid bsgom mo zhes gsum
336b4('bum): po de dag la rtog pa ste/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i
336b5('bum): chos 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod kyang / de la rtog cing / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'di ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do// bdag gis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid
336b6('bum): bsgom par bya'o/ / 'di'i don du 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid sgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la rtog pa ste/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi
336b7('bum): yan lag dge ba'i chos so/ / sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de la rtog cing / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid
337a1('bum): kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do/ / bdag gis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o// 'di'i don du mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bsgom mo zhes gsum po
337a2('bum): de dag la rtog pa ste/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid/ gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/
337a3('bum): dge ba'i chos thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid la spyod kyang / de la rtog cing / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid do// bdag
337a4('bum): gis thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o/ / 'di'i don du thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la rtog pa ste/ thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las
337a5('bum): sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos dor ba pa stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de la rtog cing / dor ba pa stong pa nyid
337a6('bum): bsgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'di ni dor ba pa stong pa nyid do// bdag gis dor ba pa stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o// 'di'i don du dor ba pa stong pa nyid bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la
337a7('bum): rtog pa ste/ dor ba pa stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos rang
337b1('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod kyang / de la rtog cing / rang bzhin stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// bdag gis rang bzhin stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o// 'di'i
337b2('bum): don du rang bzhin stong pa nyid bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la rtog pa ste/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so//
337b3('bum): sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de la rtog cing / chos thams cad stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni chos thams cad
337b4('bum): stong pa nyid do/ / bdag gis chos thams cad stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o// 'di'i don du chos thams cad stong pa nyid bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la rtog pa ste/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid gang gis
337b5('bum): bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod
337b6('bum): kyang / de la rtog cing / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do// bdag gis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bsgom par
337b7('bum): bya'o/ / 'di'i don du rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la rtog pa ste/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba
338a1('bum): 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/ / sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos pa stong pa nyid la spyod kyang / de la rtog cing / pa stong pa
338a2('bum): nyid sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni pa stong pa nyid do// bdag gis pa stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o// 'di'i don du pa stong pa nyid bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag
338a3('bum): la rtog pa ste/ pa stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos
338a4('bum): dngos po pa stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de la rtog cing / dngos po pa stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'di ni dngos po pa stong pa nyid do// bdag gis dngos po pa stong pa nyid bsgom
338a5('bum): par bya'o/ / 'di'i don du dngos po pa stong pa nyid bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la rtog pa ste/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag
338a6('bum): dge ba'i chos so/ / sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de la rtog cing / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'di ni ngo bo nyid stong
338a7('bum): pa nyid do/ / bdag gis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o// 'di'i don du ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la rtog pa ste/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing /
338b1('bum): gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de la rtog cing / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
338b2('bum): nyid sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'di ni dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// bdag gis dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o// 'di'i don du dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
338b3('bum): pa nyid bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la rtog pa ste/ dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang
338b4('bum): po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la spyod kyang de la rtog cing / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid
338b5('bum): kyi phyir/ 'di dag ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so// bdag gis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bsgom par bya'o// 'di'i don du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la rtog pa ste/ dran
338b6('bum): pa nye bar gzhag pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
338b7('bum): po'i dge ba'i chos yang dag par spong ba bzhi la spyod kyang de la rtog cing yang dag par spong ba rnams sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'di dag ni yang dag par spong ba rnams so// bdag gis yang dag par
339a1('bum): spong ba rnams bsgom par bya'o/ / 'di'i don du yang dag par spong ba rnams bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la rtog pa ste/ yang dag par spong ba gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang
339a2('bum): sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/ / sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la spyod kyang / de la rtog cing / rdzu
339a3('bum): 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'di dag ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so// bdag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bsgom par bya'o// 'di'i don du rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams
339a4('bum): bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la rtog pa ste/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar
339a5('bum): bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos dbang po lnga la spyod kyang de la rtog cing / dbang po lnga sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'di dag ni dbang po rnams so//
339a6('bum): bdag gis dbang po rnams bsgom par bya'o// 'di'i don du dbang po rnams bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la rtog pa ste/ dbang po gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi
339a7('bum): yan lag dge ba'i chos so/ / sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos stobs lnga la spyod kyang / de la rtog cing / stobs rnams sgom pa'i tshe/
339b1('bum): ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'di dag ni stobs rnams so// bdag gis stobs rnams bsgom par bya'o// 'di'i don du stobs rnams bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la rtog pa ste/ stobs gang gis
339b2('bum): bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos byang
339b3('bum): chub kyi yan lag bdun la spyod kyang / de la rtog cing / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'di dag ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so// bdag gis byang chub kyi
339b4('bum): yan lag rnams bsgom par bya'o/ / 'di'i don du byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la rtog pa ste/ byang chub kyi yan lag gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing gzhan yang sgrol ba
339b5('bum): 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/ / sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod kyang / de la rtog cing
339b6('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'di ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o// bdag gis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom par bya'o//
339b7('bum): 'di'i don du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la rtog pa ste/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni
340a1('bum): lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/ / sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la spyod kyang
340a2('bum): de la rtog cing / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'di dag ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so// bdag gis 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bsgom par bya'o//
340a3('bum): 'di'i don du 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la rtog pa ste/ 'phags pa'i bden pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i
340a4('bum): chos so/ / sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos bsam gtan bzhi la spyod kyang de la rtog cing / bsam gtan rnams sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo
340a5('bum): bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'di dag ni bsam gtan rnams so// bdag gis bsam gtan rnams bsgom par bya'o// 'di'i don du bsam gtan rnams bsgom mo// zhes gsum po de dag la rtog pa ste/
340a6('bum): bsam gtan gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
340a7('bum): chen po'i dge ba'i chos tshad pa bzhi la spyod kyang de la rtog cing / tshad pa rnams sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'di dag ni tshad pa rnams so// bdag gis tshad pa
340b1('bum): rnams bsgom par bya'o/ / 'di'i don du tshad pa rnams bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la rtog pa ste/ tshad pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i
340b2('bum): chos so/ / sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la spyod kyang / de la rtog cing / gzugs pa'i
340b3('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'di dag ni gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// bdag gis gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsgom par bya'o//
340b4('bum): 'di'i don du gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la rtog pa ste/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol
340b5('bum): ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/ / sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyod kyang / de la rtog cing / rnam
340b6('bum): par thar pa brgyad sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'di dag ni rnam par thar pa brgyad do// bdag gis rnam par thar pa brgyad bsgom par bya'o// 'di'i don du rnam par thar pa brgyad bsgom mo zhes gsum
340b7('bum): po de dag la rtog pa ste/ rnam par thar pa brgyad gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang
341a1('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la spyod kyang de la rtog cing / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sgom
341a2('bum): pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'di dag ni mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// bdag gis mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsgom par bya'o// 'di'i don du
341a3('bum): mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la rtog pa ste/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di
341a4('bum): ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/ / sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa
341a5('bum): pa la spyod kyang de la rtog cing / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'di dag ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
341a6('bum): mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa'o// bdag gis rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa bsgom par bya'o// 'di'i don du rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
341a7('bum): ma pa dang / smon pa pa bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la rtog pa ste/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang
341b1('bum): sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/ / sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod kyang de la rtog cing / mngon
341b2('bum): par shes pa rnams sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'di dag ni mngon par shes pa rnams so// bdag gis mngon par shes pa rnams bsgom par bya'o// 'di'i don du mngon par shes pa rnams bsgom
341b3('bum): mo zhes gsum po de dag la rtog pa ste/ mngon par shes pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub
341b4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod kyang de la rtog cing / ting nge 'dzin rnams sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'di dag ni ting nge 'dzin rnams so// bdag
341b5('bum): gis ting nge 'dzin rnams bsgom par bya'o/ / 'di'i don du ting nge 'dzin rnams bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la rtog pa ste/ ting nge 'dzin gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi
341b6('bum): yan lag dge ba'i chos so/ / sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod kyang de la rtog cing / gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsgom pa'i tshe/
341b7('bum): ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'di dag ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams so// bdag gis gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsgom par bya'o// 'di'i don du gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la rtog pa ste/
342a1('bum): gzungs kyi sgo gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa'
342a2('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la spyod kyang de la rtog cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs
342a3('bum): pa'i stobs rnams so/ / bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bsgom par bya'o// 'di'i don du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la rtog pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
342a4('bum): gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so/ / sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos
342a5('bum): 'jigs pa rnams la spyod kyang de la rtog cing / 'jigs pa rnams sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'di dag ni 'jigs pa rnams so// bdag gis 'jigs pa rnams bsgom par bya'o//
342a6('bum): 'di'i don du 'jigs pa rnams bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la rtog pa ste/ 'jigs pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems
342a7('bum): dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la spyod kyang / de la rtog cing / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo
342b1('bum): nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'di dag ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so// bdag gis so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bsgom par bya'o// 'di'i don du so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bsgom mo zhes gsum po
342b2('bum): de dag la rtog pa ste/ so so yang dag par rig pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub
342b3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos snying rje chen po la spyod kyang de la rtog cing / snying rje chen po sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'di ni snying rje chen po'o// bdag gis snying rje chen po bsgom
342b4('bum): par bya'o/ / 'di'i don du snying rje chen po bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la rtog pa ste/ snying rje chen po gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so//
342b5('bum): sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad la spyod kyang de la rtog cing / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
342b6('bum): brgyad sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so// bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bsgom par bya'o// 'di'i don du sangs rgyas kyi
342b7('bum): chos ma 'dres pa rnams bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la rtog pa ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing / gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so//
343a1('bum): rab 'byor dge ba'i chos de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam ste/ lam des 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar gyi byang chub
343a2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can tshad pa ded de/ 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las rgal bar gyur pa dang / rgal ba dang / rgal bar 'gyur ba ste/ lam de yongs su rdzogs par byas shing / byang chub
343a3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byas nas chos kyi 'khor lo skor ro// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te/ sems can rnams kyi
343a4('bum): don byed do/ / shes rab kyi pha tu pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u drug cu brgyad do// // de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
343a5('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te chos de dag byang chub sems dpa'i chos lags na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gang 'di skad du gal te chos de dag byang chub sems
343a6('bum): dpa'i chos yin na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos gang yin zhes zer ba ni/ rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang chos de dag nyid rnam pa thams cad du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar zad de/ de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
343a7('bum): nyid thob nas/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad yongs su spong ngo // de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
343b1('bum): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni chos thams cad skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
343b2('bum): chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la khyad par de yod do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ zhugs pa yang gzhan la/ 'bras bu la gnas pa yang gzhan te/ de
343b3('bum): gnyis ka yang 'phags pa'i gang zag ma yin zhes bya'o/ / rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bar chad pa'i lam du zhugs pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
343b4('bum): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni chos thams cad la sgrib pa pa'i ye shes brnyes pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
343b5('bum): rgyas kyi khyad par ro/ / rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa lags na/ rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos de dag la ni 'di ni sems can dmyal ba pa'o//
343b6('bum): 'di ni byol song gi skye gnas pa'o// 'di ni gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'o// 'di ni lha'o// 'di ni myi'o// 'di ni rigs kyi sa'o// 'di ni brgyad pa'o// 'di ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'o// 'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'o//
343b7('bum): 'di ni phyir 'ong ba'o// 'di ni dgra bcom pa'o// 'di ni rang sangs rgyas so// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'o// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes bgyi bar
344a1('bum): khyad par dang / rnam par dbye bar ji ltar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar gang zag de dag su ma mchis pa de bzhin du las kyang su ma mchis/ las ji ltar su ma mchis
344a2('bum): pa de bzhin du las kyi rnam par smyin pa yang su ma mchis so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin te/ de de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid
344a3('bum): kyis stong pa la/ las dang las kyi rnam par smyin pa so// rab 'byor gang gis rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos thams cad de ltar ma shes pa de dag ni ngan par spyad pa 'am/ legs par spyad pa 'am/
344a4('bum): g.yo ba'i las mngon par 'du byed de/ de dag ngan par spyad pa'i las kyis ngan song gsum du ltung ngo // legs par spyad pa'i las kyis lha dang myir skye'o// nyams pa pa'i las kyis gzugs kyi khams sam/
344a5('bum): gzugs pa'i khams su skye'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad/ brtson
344a6('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad/ nang stong pa nyid la spyad/ phyi stong pa nyid la spyad/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyad/ stong pa nyid stong pa
344a7('bum): nyid la spyad/ chen po stong pa nyid la spyad/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyad/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyad/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyad/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyad/ thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa
344b1('bum): nyid la spyad/ dor ba pa stong pa nyid la spyad/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyad/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyad/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyad/ pa stong pa nyid la spyad/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid
344b2('bum): la spyad/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyad/ dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyad/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyad/ yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyad/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyad/ dbang po
344b3('bum): rnams la spyad/ stobs rnams la spyad/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyad/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyad/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyad/ bsam gtan rnams la spyad/ tshad pa
344b4('bum): rnams la spyad/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyad/ rnam par thar pa rnams la spyad/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyad/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
344b5('bum): mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa la spyad/ mngon par shes pa rnams la spyad/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyad/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyad/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la spyad/ 'jigs pa
344b6('bum): rnams la spyad/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la spyad/ byams pa chen po la spyad/ snying rje chen po la spyad/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad la spyad de/ nyams pa pa'i spyod pas byang chub kyi
344b7('bum): lam bskyed nas/ rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin byang chub kyi yan lag gi 'khor dang ldan pa la mnyam par gzhag cing / bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ mngon par
345a1('bum): rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can rnams kyi don byed de/ don byas nas ci nas kyang phyis chud ma zos shing / rgyud lnga'i 'khor bar ltung ba de ltar don byed do// gsol pa/ bcom
345a2('bum): ldan 'das ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ rgyud lnga'i 'khor ba gzigs sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab
345a3('bum): 'byor ma yin no/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ de bzhin gshegs pas chos nag po 'am dkar po 'am gnag pa 'am/ dkar ba 'am/ gnag dkar ba lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das
345a4('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ ma yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ste ma na/ sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du ji ltar gdags pa mdzad/ lha
345a5('bum): dang myir ji ltar gdags pa mdzad/ rgyun tu zhugs par ji ltar gdags pa mdzad/ lan cig phyir 'ong bar ji ltar gdags pa mdzad/ phyir 'ong bar ji ltar gdags pa mdzad/ dgra bcom par ji ltar gdags pa mdzad/
345a6('bum): rang sangs rgyas su ji ltar gdags pa mdzad/ byang chub sems dpar ji ltar gdags pa mdzad/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su ji ltar gdags pa mdzad/ bcom ldan
345a7('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor ci sems can 'di dag chos rnams rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par shes sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rab 'byor
345b1('bum): gal te sems can de dag 'di ltar chos rnams rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong ngo zhes bya bar shes na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'jug ste/ bla na
345b2('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ma zhugs na/ sems can rnams kyang ngan song gsum dang / 'khor ba'i rgyud rnams nas 'grol te/ rab 'byor sems can de dag chos rnams rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par
345b3('bum): shes la/ shes pas rgyud lnga'i 'khor ba las yongs su 'grol bas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par
345b4('bum): thos nas/ sems can rnams kyi don du bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'jug ste/ chos 'di dag ni ji ltar byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyis mngon par chags par bya ba de ltar yod pa ma yin na/ de dag ni
345b5('bum): cing yang dag pa ma yin pa'i chos rnams la yod par brtags shing / sems can pa la sems can du 'du shes/ gzugs pa la gzugs su 'du shes/ tshor ba pa la tshor bar 'du shes/ 'du shes pa
345b6('bum): la 'du shes su 'du shes/ 'du byed pa la 'du byed du 'du shes/ rnam par shes pa pa la rnam par shes par 'du shes/ pa la tu 'du shes/ rna ba pa la rna bar 'du shes/ sna pa la snar
345b7('bum): 'du shes/ lce pa la lcer 'du shes/ lus pa la lus su 'du shes/ yid pa la yid du 'du shes/ gzugs pa la gzugs su 'du shes/ sgra pa la sgrar 'du shes/ dri pa la drir
346a1('bum): 'du shes/ ro pa la ror 'du shes/ reg pa la reg tu 'du shes/ chos pa la chos su 'du shes/ gi rnam par shes pa pa la gi rnam par shes par 'du shes/ rna ba'i
346a2('bum): rnam par shes pa pa la rna ba'i rnam par shes par 'du shes/ sna'i rnam par shes pa pa la sna'i rnam par shes par 'du shes/ lce'i rnam par shes pa pa la lce'i rnam par shes par 'du shes/ lus kyi rnam
346a3('bum): par shes pa pa la lus kyi rnam par shes par 'du shes/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa pa la yid kyi rnam par shes par 'du shes/ gi 'dus te reg pa pa la gi 'dus te reg par 'du shes/ rna ba'i 'dus
346a4('bum): te reg pa pa la rna ba'i 'dus te reg par 'du shes/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa pa la sna'i 'dus te reg par 'du shes/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa pa la lce'i 'dus te reg par 'du shes/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa
346a5('bum): pa la lus kyi 'dus te reg par 'du shes/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa pa la yid kyi 'dus te reg par 'du shes/ gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba pa la gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar 'du
346a6('bum): shes/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba pa la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar 'du shes/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ba la sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar 'du shes/
346a7('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba pa la lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar 'du shes/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba pa la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar 'du shes/ yid
346b1('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba pa la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar 'du shes/ sa'i khams pa la sa'i khams su 'du shes/ chu'i khams pa la chu'i khams su 'du shes/ khams
346b2('bum): pa la khams su 'du shes/ rlung gi khams pa la rlung gi khams su 'du shes/ nam mkha'i khams pa la nam mkha'i khams su 'du shes/ rnam par shes pa'i khams pa la rnam par shes pa'i
346b3('bum): khams su 'du shes/ ma rig pa pa lam rig par 'du shes/ 'du byed pa la 'du byed du 'du shes/ rnam par shes pa pa la rnam par shes par 'du shes/ dang gzugs pa la dang gzugs
346b4('bum): su 'du shes/ skye mched drug pa la skye mched drug tu 'du shes/ reg pa pa la reg par 'du shes/ tshor ba pa la tshor bar 'du shes/ sred pa pa la sred par 'du shes/ len pa pa la len par
346b5('bum): 'du shes/ srid pa pa la srid par 'du shes/ skye ba pa la skye bar 'du shes/ rga shi pa la rga shir 'du shes/ 'jig rten pa'i chos pa la 'jig rten pa'i chos su 'du shes/ 'jig rten las 'das
346b6('bum): pa'i chos pa la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos su 'du shes/ zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos pa la zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos su 'du shes/ zag pa pa'i chos pa la zag pa pa'i chos su 'du shes/
346b7('bum): 'dus byas kyi chos pa la 'dus byas kyi chos su 'du shes/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos pa la 'dus ma byas kyi chos su 'du shes nas/ yod pa ma yin pa'i phyin ci log gis/ phyin ci log tu gyur pa'i sems dang
347a1('bum): ldan pa rnams/ lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las mngon par 'du byed pa de dag rgyud lnga'i 'khor ba las yongs su 'grol ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
347a2('bum): tu phyin par dge ba'i chos thams cad 'dus par byas te/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod cing / bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par sangs
347a3('bum): rgyas nas/ rgyud lnga'i 'khor ba las sems can rnams yongs su 'grel to// // shes rab kyi pha tu pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po nyi shu gsum pa//
347a4('bum): rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ gal te chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa lags na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
347a5('bum): rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ rgyud lnga'i 'khor ba las sems can rnams yongs su 'grel ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na
347a6('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam sems can
347a7('bum): rnams la ston to/ / 'chad do// 'jog go/ 'god do// 'grel to// rnam par 'grel to// gsal bar byed do// yang dag par rjod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'dir dge ba'i chos byang chub kyi phyogs
347b1('bum): gang ji snyed pa gang gis dkon mchog gsum rnam par 'god pa de thams cad yongs su 'dus te/ sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang / chos dkon mchog dang / dge 'dun dkon mchog gsum 'jig rten du byung bas/
347b2('bum): sems can rnams lam rgyud lnga'i 'khor ba las yongs su dgrol lo// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sdug bsngal 'tshal bas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ram/ 'on te sdug bsngal gyis
347b3('bum): mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur/ kun 'byung ba 'tshal bas/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ram/ 'on te kun 'byung bas mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur/ sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'tshal bas yongs su mya ngan
347b4('bum): las 'da' bar 'gyur ram/ 'on te sdug bsngal 'gog pas mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur/ lam 'tshal bas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ram/ 'on te lam gyis mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur/ bcom
347b5('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor sdug bsngal shes pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ste/ sdug bsngal gyis kyang ma yin no// kun 'byung ba shes pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ste/ kun 'byung
347b6('bum): bas kyang ma yin no/ / sdug bsngal 'gog pa shes bas/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ste/ sdug bsngal 'gog pas kyang ma yin no// lam shes pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ste/ lam gyis kyang
347b7('bum): ma yin no/ / rab 'byor 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po de dag mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de ni mya ngan las 'da' bar ngas gsungs te/ sdug bsngal shes pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ma yin no// sdug bsngal
348a1('bum): gyis kyang ma yin no/ / kun 'byung ba shes pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ma yin no// kun 'byung bas kyang ma yin no// sdug bsngal 'gog pa shes pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ma
348a2('bum): yin/ sdug bsngal 'gog pas kyang ma yin no// lam shes pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ma yin/ lam gyis kyang ma yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang la sdug bsngal yang ma mchis/ sdug
348a3('bum): bsngal 'tshal ba yang ma mchis/ kun 'byung ba yang ma mchis/ kun 'byung ba 'tshal ba yang ma mchis/ 'gog pa yang ma mchis/ 'gog pa 'tshal ba yang ma mchis/ lam yang ma mchis/ lam 'tshal ba
348a4('bum): yang ma mchis pa'i 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi mnyam pa nyid ces bgyi ba de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ni 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po de dag gi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid
348a5('bum): dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung / de bzhin
348a6('bum): gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste/ de bzhin gnas pa'i dbyings/ chos kyi dbyings nyam/ 'grib par 'dug pa ste/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
348a7('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ bden pa khong du chud par ji ltar bya ba bzhin du/ bden pa khong du chud par bya ba'i don du spyod do// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
348b1('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ji ltar spyod na/ bden pa rtogs pa'i don du spyod pa lags/ ji ltar spyod na bden pa rtogs shing 'tshal te/ khong du chud nas nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung zhing byang
348b2('bum): chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis par 'jug pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos
348b3('bum): de dag ci nas kyang chos gang yang su pa de ltar mthong ste/ chos thams cad ma pas bden par gtogs pa 'am/ bden par ma gtogs pa'i chos thams cad stong par mthong ste/ des de ltar mthong
348b4('bum): bas skyon par chud pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rigs kyis la gnas par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' de rigs kyis la gnas par gyur nas/ spyi bor ltung bar 'gyur te/ de la nyan thos
348b5('bum): kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung ba'i spyi bor ltung ba do// de byang chub sems dpa'i rigs kyis de la gnas shing / bsam gtan bzhi sgrub po// tshad pa bzhi sgrub po// gzugs pa'i
348b6('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi sgrub bo/ / de lhag mthong gis de la gnas shing / chos thams cad rab tu shes par byed de/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi khong du chud par byed do// de sdug bsngal yongs su shes kyang sdug
348b7('bum): bsngal la pa'i sems skyed do/ / kun 'byung ba rab tu spangs kyang / kun 'byung ba la pa'i sems skyed do// 'gog pa mngon du byed kyang 'gog pa la pa'i sems skyed do//
349a1('bum): lam sgom yang lam la dmigs pa'i sems skyed do// gzhan du na byang chub la gzhol ba'i sems kyis chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mthong bar byed do// gsol pa/ bcom
349a2('bum): ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin zhes bgyi ba de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ stong pa nyid do// gsol pa/ stong pa nyid gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
349a3('bum): stsal pa/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid de/ rnam pa de lta bu'i lhag mthong gis chos thams cad stong pa'o zhes bya bar lta ste/ ngo bo nyid gang la gnas shing byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba de lta bu'i
349a4('bum): ngo bo nyid chos gang la yang ngo bo nyid yod par mthong ngo / / dngos po pa ni byang chub ste/ de ni sangs rgyas kyis ma mdzad/ rang sangs rgyas kyis ma byas/ dgra bcom pas ma byas/ phyir 'ong bas ma byas/ lan
349a5('bum): cig phyir 'ong bas ma byas/ rgyun tu zhugs pas ma byas/ de dag la zhugs pas kyang ma byas/ gang byang chub 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis kyang ma byas te/ gzhan du na yang
349a6('bum): dag pa ji lta ba de sems can rnams kyis shes mthong bas de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams la chos ston to//
349a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha tu pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u drug cu dgu'o// // de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
349b1('bum): gal te chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis te/ de dag sangs rgyas kyis kyang ma mdzad/ rang sangs rgyas kyis kyang ma bgyis/ dgra bcom pas kyang ma bgyis/ phyir 'ong bas kyang ma bgyis/ lan cig phyir 'ong
349b2('bum): bas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyun tu zhugs pas kyang ma bgyis/ de dag la zhugs pas kyang ma bgyis/ gang byang chub 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis kyang ma bgyis na/ chos de dag la
349b3('bum): 'di dag ni sems can dmyal ba pa'o/ / 'di dag ni byol song gi skye gnas pa'o// 'di dag ni gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'o// 'di dag ni lha'o// 'di dag ni myi'o// las 'dis ni sems can dmyal ba pa dang /
349b4('bum): byol song gi skye gnas pa dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten par 'gyur ro// las 'dis ni myir 'gyur ro// las 'dis ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar 'gyur ro// las 'dis ni sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lhar 'gyur ro//
349b5('bum): las 'dis ni mtshe ma'i lhar 'gyur ro// las 'dis ni dga' ldan gyi lhar 'gyur ro// las 'dis ni 'phrul dga'i lhar 'gyur ro// las 'dis ni gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lhar 'gyur ro// las 'dis
349b6('bum): ni tshangs ris kyi lhar 'gyur ro/ / las 'dis ni tshangs lha nye phan gyi lhar 'gyur ro// las 'dis ni tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lhar 'gyur ro// las 'dis ni tshangs chen gyi lhar 'gyur ro// las 'dis ni snang ba'i
349b7('bum): lhar 'gyur ro/ / las 'dis ni chung snang gi lhar 'gyur ro// las 'dis ni tshad snang ba'i lhar 'gyur ro// las 'dis ni kun snang dang ba'i lhar 'gyur ro// las 'dis ni dge ba'i lhar 'gyur ro// las
350a1('bum): 'dis ni chung dge'i lhar 'gyur ro/ / las 'dis ni tshad dge ba'i lhar 'gyur ro// las 'dis ni dge rgyas kyi lhar 'gyur ro// las 'dis ni che ba'i lhar 'gyur ro// las 'dis ni
350a2('bum): chung che'i lhar 'gyur ro/ / las 'dis ni tshad che ba'i lhar 'gyur ro// las 'dis ni 'bras bu che ba'i lhar 'gyur ro// las 'dis ni che ba'i lhar 'gyur ro// las 'dis ni gdung ba'i lhar 'gyur ro//
350a3('bum): las 'dis ni shin tu mthong ba'i lhar 'gyur ro// las 'dis ni gya nom snang ba'i lhar 'gyur ro// las 'dis ni 'og gyi lhar 'gyur ro// las 'dis ni nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lhar 'gyur ro//
350a4('bum): las 'dis ni rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lhar 'gyur ro// las 'dis ni pa'i skye mched kyi lhar 'gyur ro// las 'di ni 'du shes 'du shes skye mched kyi lhar 'gyur ro// las
350a5('bum): 'dis ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bur 'gyur ro/ / las 'dis ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bur 'gyur ro// las 'dis ni phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bur 'gyur ro// las 'dis ni dgra bcom pa nyid du 'gyur
350a6('bum): ro/ / las 'dis ni rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro// las 'dis ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen por 'gyur ro// las 'dis ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro
350a7('bum): zhes bgyi bar tha dad du dbye ba 'am/ rnam par dgod pa yang ji ltar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das dngos po ma mchis pa la ni bgyi ba gang yang ma mchis te/ bgyi ba gang gis sems can dmyal bar mchi ba 'am/ byol song
350b1('bum): gi skye gnas su mchi ba 'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du mchi ba 'am/ myir skye ba 'am/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lhar skye ba 'am/ mtshe ma'i lhar skye ba 'am/ dga' ldan gyi
350b2('bum): lhar skye ba 'am/ 'phrul dga'i lhar skye ba 'am/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ tshangs ris kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ tshangs lha nye phan gyi lhar skye ba 'am/ tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lhar skye ba 'am/ tshangs chen gyi
350b3('bum): lhar skye ba 'am/ snang ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ chung snang gi lhar skye ba 'am/ tshad snang ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ kun snang dang ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ dge ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ chung dge'i lhar skye ba 'am/ tshad
350b4('bum): dge ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ dge rgyas kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ che ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ chung che'i lhar skye ba 'am/ tshad che ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ 'bras bu che ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ che ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/
350b5('bum): gdung ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ shin tu mthong ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ gya nom snang ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ 'og gyi lhar skye ba 'am/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye
350b6('bum): mched kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ pa'i skye mched kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ 'du shes 'du shes skye mched kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i
350b7('bum): 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba 'am/ phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba 'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba 'am/ rang byang chub thob par 'gyur ba 'am/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
351a1('bum): lam la spyod par 'gyur ba 'am/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba 'am/ thob bar gyur nas sems can rnams 'khor ba las yongs su dgrol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba de lta bu gang yang
351a2('bum): ma mchis so/ / de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ ji skad du smras pa bzhin te/ rab 'byor
351a3('bum): dngos po pa la ni las kyang / bya ba yang / 'bras bu yang na/ 'on kyang byis pa so so'i skye bo// 'phags pa'i chos la mkhas pa rnams kyis chos rnams dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid du shes te/
351a4('bum): phyin ci log las byung ba'i sems kyis las sna tshogs mngon par 'du byed pas/ de dag gi lus rnam pa de bzhin du mngon par 'grub ste/ sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i
351a5('bum): 'jig rten nam/ 'am/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha 'am/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha 'am/ mtshe ma'i lha 'am/ dga' ldan gyi lha 'am/ 'phrul dga'i lha 'am/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha 'am/
351a6('bum): tshangs ris kyi lha 'am/ tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha 'am/ tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha 'am/ tshangs chen gyi lha 'am/ snang ba'i lha 'am/ chung snang gi lha 'am/ tshad snang ba'i lha 'am/ kun snang dang
351a7('bum): ba'i lha 'am/ dge ba'i lha 'am/ chung dge'i lha 'am/ tshad dge ba'i lha 'am/ dge rgyas kyi lha 'am/ che ba'i lha 'am/ chung che'i lha 'am/ tshad che ba'i lha 'am/ 'bras bu che ba'i lha 'am/
351b1('bum): che ba'i lha 'am/ gdung ba'i lha 'am/ shin tu mthong ba'i lha 'am/ gya nom snang ba'i lha 'am/ 'og gyi lha 'am/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha 'am/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha 'am/ chung
351b2('bum): zad pa'i skye mched kyi lha 'am/ 'du shes 'du shes skye mched kyi lha'i nang du lus mngon par 'grub ste/ dngos po pa la ni las sam/ bya ba 'am/ 'bras bu de/ dngos po pa gang yin pa de ni dngos
351b3('bum): po pa nyid do/ / rab 'byor de la 'di skad du dngos po pa la ni bya ba gang yang de/ bya ba gang gis sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas su 'gro ba 'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro ba 'am/
351b4('bum): myir skye ba 'am/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lhar skye ba 'am/ mtshe ma'i lhar skye ba 'am/ dga' ldan gyi lhar skye ba 'am/ 'phrul dga'i lhar skye ba 'am/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed
351b5('bum): kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ tshangs ris kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ tshangs lha nye phan gyi lhar skye ba 'am/ tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lhar skye ba 'am/ tshangs chen gyi lhar skye ba 'am/ snang ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ chung snang gi lhar
351b6('bum): skye ba 'am/ tshad snang ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ kun snang dang ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ dge ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ chung dge'i lhar skye ba 'am/ tshad dge ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ dge rgyas kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ che
351b7('bum): ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ chung che'i lhar skye ba 'am/ tshad che ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ 'bras bu che ba'i lhar skye ba'am/ che ba'i lhar skye ba'am/ gdung ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ shin tu mthong ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/
352a1('bum): gya nom snang ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ 'og gyi lhar skye ba 'am/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ pa'i skye
352a2('bum): mched kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ 'du shes 'du shes skye mched kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba 'am/ phyir 'ong ba'i
352a3('bum): 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba 'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba 'am/ rang byang chub thob par 'gyur ba 'am/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam la spyod pa 'am/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
352a4('bum): nyid thob par 'gyur ba 'am/ de thob nas sems can rnams 'khor ba las yongs su dgrol bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i bya ba gang yang do zhes zer ba ni/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ lam dngos po pa ma
352a5('bum): yin nam/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dngos po pa ma yin nam/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dngos po pa ma yin nam/ phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dngos po pa ma yin nam/ dgra bcom pa nyid dngos
352a6('bum): po pa ma yin nam/ rang byang chub dngos po pa ma yin nam/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dngos po pa ma yin nam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dngos po pa ma yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom
352a7('bum): ldan 'das lam ni dngos po ma mchis pa'o/ / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni dngos po ma mchis pa'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni dngos po ma mchis pa'o// phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni dngos po ma mchis
352b1('bum): pa'o/ / dgra bcom pa nyid ni dngos po ma mchis pa'o// rang byang chub ni dngos po ma mchis pa'o// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni dngos po ma mchis pa'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni dngos po ma mchis pa'o//
352b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ dngos po pa'i chos shig dngos po pa'i chos thob par byed snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom
352b3('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ltar na dngos po pa gang yin pa dang / lam gang yin pa'i chos de gnyis ka yang ldan pa yang ma yin ldan pa yang ma yin gzugs pa/ bstan du pa/
352b4('bum): thogs pa pa/ mtshan nyid pa/ mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid pa'o// rab 'byor de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
352b5('bum): thabs mkhas pas sems can phyin ci log bzhis phung po lnga la mngon par zhen pa rtag pa la rtag pa'i 'du shes su gyur pa/ sdug bsngal ba la bde ba'i 'du shes su gyur pa/ bdag pa la bdag gi 'du shes su
352b6('bum): gyur pa/ sdug pa la sdug pa'i 'du shes su gyur pa/ dngos po la mngon par zhen pa rnams dngos po las rnam par 'grel to// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ byis pa so so'i skye
352b7('bum): bo rnams gang la dngos po'o zhes nas mngon par zhen par gyur pa de lta bu'i dngos po de bzhin ma nor ba de bzhin zhes bgyi ba ma mchis sam/ de ste ma mchis na ni las mngon par 'du bgyid par yang ji ltar 'gyur/
353a1('bum): sug las des kyang shul rgyud lnga'i 'khor ba las ci ste 'grol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor phyin ci log ma gtogs par gang la gnas te/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams
353a2('bum): las mngon par 'du byed pa'i dngos po ni chung ngu na/ skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas bzhag pa tsam yang do// rab 'byor de lta bas na ci nas kyang don 'di gsal zhing rdzogs pa dang / mkhas pas shes par bya ba'i phyir khyod la dpe
353a3('bum): bshad do/ / rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ lam du mthong ba la lam mthong ba de gang la gnas shing / 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas yongs su spyod pa de lta bu'i dngos po gang yang yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan
353a4('bum): 'das lam nyid kyang ma mchis na/ lam mthong ba de la gnas shing / 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas yongs su spyod pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab
353a5('bum): 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ 'jig rten pa 'am/ 'jig rten las 'das pa 'am/ zag pa dang bcas pa 'am/ zag pa pa 'am/ 'dus byas sam/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang la lam dang 'dra ba ma yin
353a6('bum): pa de lta bu yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa 'am/ 'jig rten las 'das pa 'am/ zag pa dang bcas pa 'am/ zag pa ma mchis pa 'am/ 'dus byas sam/ 'dus ma byas kyi
353a7('bum): chos gang yang lam lta bu ma lags pa de lta bu ma mchis so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ci lam la rgyud lnga'i 'khor ba yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//
353b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ lam la lam bsgoms pas/ kun nas nyon mongs par yang 'gyur la/ rnam par byang bar yang 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lam bsgom
353b2('bum): pa yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das de ni dngos po ma mchis te/ brjod pa dang / tshig dang / sgra dang / yi ge thams cad kyis gdags su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan
353b3('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ me long la gzugs brnyan snang ba de la gang las mngon par 'du byed cing / mngon par 'du byas pas/ sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba 'am/ byol
353b4('bum): song gi skye gnas su 'gro ba'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro ba 'am/ dang lhar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dngos po yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das de ni gzhan

357b6('bum): mched kyi lhar skye ba 'am/ 'du shes 'du shes skye mched kyi lhar skye bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dngos po yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das sprul pa de la
